Short Summary

I got my bag stolen while I was out. It had my wallet with several hundred in cash, drivers license, credit card, bank card, the whole shebang, my cell phone, mobile

column2:
>I filed everything with the police and they couldn't even spare me a few dollars to get back home, but a wonderful cab driver trusted me to retrieve money from my house to pay him later. (He told me how he'd been scammed in a similar way before... He is the most samaritan.)
I'm currently in the process of cancelling and reissuing everything and it's hitting me harder and harder how much was riding in that bag.
I feel really terrible right now, especially because it could have been prevented by so many things including myself, but it wasn't. I'm not in a very stable economic situation right now so I could use all the help I could get.

What We Need &

column1:
• The goal is just a part of what the total worth of my bag was, but every penny counts.
  • Every contributor receives my deepest gratitude, from the bottom of my heart.

Other Ways You Can Help

    • Besides monetary contributions, advice on what to do after losing something or stories about going through similar situations are all welcome.

UVN SHAKE

UVN SHAKE - The first of its kind shake watches display time when you
shake your wrist. It is also one of the very few solar powered smart watches
available in the market.

Simple and absolutely a no nonsense smart watch which does not require everyday charging.



A silent yet powerful watch which can keep you on track
• Simple to handle, no touch screen, solar powered smart watch which can vibrate and alert you on notifications
• No charging required. Worry free to go on for 1 Year
• No Annoying sounds. Simple light and vibration alerts
• Simple connectivity. Works with all android and iOS phones.

SOLAR POWERED


TIME DISPLAY



SOCIAL FEEDS



FEATURES


WATCH SPECIFICATIONS

Case Material:  Black carbon brushed metal
Case Diameter: 45 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Band Material: Matt Finish All weather Silicone
Battery: CR2016 Lithium Button Batteries
Dial Window Material: Crystal Non Scratch Glass
Water Resistant: 3 ATM




TIMELINE
column3:
Challenges

Promotion is our utmost challenge. Spreading the word about our watch is a mammoth task and we hope with your help we can reach the world. We have studied the market and we are pretty much sure our unique design and features will make our product stand out in the crowd. There are so many beautiful watches to choose and we guarantee that our watch is nothing like you have ever seen. The results are in your hands, the more you spread the word, the more sooner and easier it is for us to bring our product to reality.

Since we have been dealing with building frames for over a decade we have a good reputation and rapport with our vendor and we are very much confident that we can deliver a quality product that remains in time on your hands.


FAQ

column1:
When will I get my UVN Shake Watch?

We plan to ship the watches between November and December. Our goal is to deliver the watches before Christmas, making it a memorable piece of gift. We have been developing frames for over a decade and we are very much confident that our watches will be in your hands at the right time.


Is UVN Shake a Unisex watch?

Yes. UVN Shake is unisex. We have designed it in such a way that you can wear it on all occasions.


IS the watch waterproof?

UVN Shake watches are water resistant. But we advice you not to wear it while you are swimming. 


How about the warranty?

We provide a 2 Year's warranty on the watch.


Does the watch have a touch screen?

No. UVN Shake watches does not have a touch screen. 


What phones are compatible with UVN Shake watches?

All Android and iOS phones.


Does the watch display messages, emails and social status?

No. The watch just alerts you when you receive an update. It glows in more than 12 different colors and vibrates, to indicate the type of alert you have received. The alert messages and vibrations are on for a period of 10 seconds. 


Can the watch find my phone?

Yes. Built in sensors vibrates continuously when you leave your phone behind. Also the phone's led glows red when you are away from the phone.


Do I have to charge the watch?

No. Our main goal was to build a watch that does not require everyday charging. The watch has an inbuilt solar panel along with a lithium battery which keeps it on for ever.


How long does the battery last?

We estimate that you can go on for at least an year before you replace your battery. No charging is required.



    Thank you

A big thank you for all the backers no matter how much you have contributed. Every single penny counts. Please share our project on facebook and twitter and help us realize our dream.

    If you have any suggestions on improving the product, please feel free to write to us at support@einkclocks.net

    Thank you for your time.

column21: >The original idea behind Monkey O's was inspired by a scene in Jim Carrey's 1994 hit film <i style=""margin-top: 0px
column41: >The Mask. In this particular scene Stanley Ipkiss (Carrey) was in the park trying to seduce a young woman. His efforts included inhaling a substantial amount of smoke from his cigarette and then blowing out a smoke heart with an arrow going through it. The woman was not only mesmerized by this simple smoke shape but she was wildly entertained by its uniqueness, as were we.

column21: >A few days later we decided to accompany a group of friends to a local hookah lounge. What we observed was truly what sparked the creation of Monkey O's. We observed that the atmosphere in this hookah lounge and the few others that we had been to allows for parties to drink, smoke hookah, converse, and not much else. Furthermore, we observed that the group next to us was having a blast and drawing a lot of attention by attempting simple smoking tricks such as blowing a smoke ring. We noticed that two of the four members in the group could produce 1 or 2 rings per attempt, and there was a cheer every time one was successfully produced. The remaining two were attempting to learn how to blow their own rings, and even though their attempts were unsuccessful, it was very evident that they were having a great time trying.

>After witnessing this, we were determined to find a very simple product that could help even the most amateur of smokers achieve this added dynamic of fun and entertainment by assisting them in blowing smoke rings.
>After hitting the drawing board, we were able to mold some prototypes out of modeling clay and bring them to a local glass blower for production.

>After our first few attempts at a working prototype were finished, we were able to approach an engineer to help us refine our design to make it more effective. After producing dozens of more prototypes, all different dimensions, we were able to pinpoint the design that worked more consistently than the rest.

column41: >Instead of designing a model that would produce a perfect O ring in every attempt, we chose a model that would allow the user to become more efficient at producing the rings with practice. We felt that this small learning curve would add a fun challenge to the users experience allowing them to stay interested and engaged in our product.

column21: >We have plans for product expansion that include a new ""Double-Barrel"" feature for the MONKEY O. This item will simultaneously shoot out 2 rings from the product. This prototype is currently in production as well.

>We found that the most efficient way to produce the rings was to control our breathing while simultaneously making sounds such as ""ooh..ooh...ahh...ahh"" originating from the diaphragm. After experimenting with the product for some time, we realized that the ""ooh..ooh...ahh...ahh"" sounds that we were making sounded a lot like the sounds that monkeys make...and just like that we found the perfect name for our company: Monkey O's!

>While testing the product, we were able to discover that with a few modifications, our product could be used not only for blowing smoke rings, but also to blow smoke bubbles! Yes, that's correct, our product is now a 2 in 1 design! The possibilities and fun are endless with the 2 in 1 Monkey O!

column79:
>Our production plan involves contacting numerous glass manufacturers (for which the process has already begun) around the world to find one that fits best with our vision and product. 

We are currently working with a sole glass blower to produce each product (at a rate of 10 min. per piece). While this is effective, in order to grow more rapidly and keep up with demand we are looking to take our product to a manufacturer. Shortly after funding is raised we will be able to move forward into production via manufacturers. 
We aim to be available for purchase in hundreds of Hookah Lounges as well as Smoke Shops. We have already gained interest in the product in these markets as well as begun developing a network, and we are eager for your support to help us grow as fast as we can keep up with the demand. We will also sell the MONKEY O's online via our website: www.monkey-os.com.
column88:
>

One of the risks that we were immediately able to identify was that our product is made completely out of glass. If mishandled or dropped the product may crack or break. In order to help alleviate this risk, we have made it a point to use only the highest quality glass and glass production techniques.

Our biggest challenge is going to be reaching economies of scale in order to help drive our material and production costs as low as possible. Hand glass blowing is very labor and time intensive, and raw materials are always cheaper in bulk orders. Acquiring the capital to reach a cost effective pricing point will allow us to kickstart production and offer our product to consumers at the lowest price possible! We have aligned a plethora of avenues that can jumpstart the wholesale ordering (shops, hookah lounges) that will in turn drive the cost down per product.

column1: The original idea behind Monkey O's was inspired by a scene in Jim Carrey's 1994 hit film The Mask. In this particular scene Stanley Ipkiss (Carrey) was in the park trying to seduce a young woman. His efforts included inhaling a substantial amount of smoke from his cigarette and then blowing out a smoke heart with an arrow going through it. The woman was not only mesmerized by this simple smoke shape but she was wildly entertained by its uniqueness, as were we.

A few days later we decided to accompany a group of friends to a local hookah lounge. What we observed was truly what sparked the creation of Monkey O's. We observed that the atmosphere in this hookah lounge and the few others that we had been to allows for parties to drink, smoke hookah, converse, and not much else. Furthermore, we observed that the group next to us was having a blast and drawing a lot of attention by attempting simple smoking tricks such as blowing a smoke ring. We noticed that two of the four members in the group could produce 1 or 2 rings per attempt, and there was a cheer every time one was successfully produced. The remaining two were attempting to learn how to blow their own rings, and even though their attempts were unsuccessful, it was very evident that they were having a great time trying.

After witnessing this, we were determined to find a very simple product that could help even the most amateur of smokers achieve this added dynamic of fun and entertainment by assisting them in blowing smoke rings.
After hitting the drawing board, we were able to mold some prototypes out of modeling clay and bring them to a local glass blower for production.

After our first few attempts at a working prototype were finished, we were able to approach an engineer to help us refine our design to make it more effective. After producing dozens of more prototypes, all different dimensions, we were able to pinpoint the design that worked more consistently than the rest.
We created over 50 hand glass blown models

Now that we had our product, the next step was to educate the user on how to effectively use it. Instead of designing a model that would produce a perfect O ring in every attempt, we chose a model that would allow the user to become more efficient at producing the rings with practice. We felt that this small learning curve would add a fun challenge to the users experience allowing them to stay interested and engaged in our product.

We have plans for product expansion that include a new ""Double-Barrel"" feature for the MONKEY O. This item will simultaneously shoot out 2 rings from the product. This prototype is currently in production as well.

We found that the most efficient way to produce the rings was to control our breathing while simultaneously making sounds such as ""ooh..ooh...ahh...ahh"" originating from the diaphragm. After experimenting with the product for some time, we realized that the ""ooh..ooh...ahh...ahh"" sounds that we were making sounded a lot like the sounds that monkeys make...and just like that we found the perfect name for our company: Monkey O's!

While testing the product, we were able to discover that with a few modifications, our product could be used not only for blowing smoke rings, but also to blow smoke bubbles! Yes, that's correct, our product is now a 2 in 1 design! The possibilities and fun are endless with the 2 in 1 Monkey O!

Blow Your Friends Away With Crisp & Consistent Smoke Rings!Blowing Smoke Bubbles Made Easy With The MONKEY PRODUCTIONOur production plan involves contacting numerous glass manufacturers (for which the process has already begun) around the world to find one that fits best with our vision and product. We are currently working with a sole glass blower to produce each product (at a rate of 10 min. per piece). While this is effective, in order to grow more rapidly and keep up with demand we are looking to take our product to a manufacturer. Shortly after funding is raised we will be able to move forward into production via manufacturers. We aim to be available for purchase in hundreds of Hookah Lounges as well as Smoke Shops. We have already gained interest in the product in these markets as well as begun developing a network, and we are eager for your support to help us grow as fast as we can keep up with the demand. We will also sell the MONKEY O's online via our website: www.monkey-os.com. POTENTIAL CHALLENGESOne of the risks that we were immediately able to identify was that our product is made completely out of glass. If mishandled or dropped the product may crack or break. In order to help alleviate this risk, we have made it a point to use only the highest quality glass and glass production techniques.Our biggest challenge is going to be reaching economies of scale in order to help drive our material and production costs as low as possible. Hand glass blowing is very labor and time intensive, and raw materials are always cheaper in bulk orders. Acquiring the capital to reach a cost effective pricing point will allow us to kickstart production and offer our product to consumers at the lowest price possible! We have aligned a plethora of avenues that can jumpstart the wholesale ordering (shops, hookah lounges) that will in turn drive the cost down per product.",4.0,0,"1 Campaign

Look at What the Triangle Business Journal Said About Comb720-
Also Checkout What WRAL Wrote About Comb720-

Background

Hello! My name is Davis and all my life I've had a passion for technology. I was often involved in projects such as building computers or making apps. I also really love honey bees! I have two bee hives, they are my pride and joy. I never thought these two passions could collide. One day, I was at the beach on cnet.com looking at smart watches and I realized just how un-user friendly they were. I decided I could create a smart watch that was easier to use and more efficient than all the cumbersome smart watches out at the time. That's when I had a vision! I saw a smart watch that used a tessellation of seven hexagons to put information right at a user's fingertips. After many hours of research and google sketchup renderings, Comb720 was born.

Comb720 currently runs off an open-source platform called WaRP board. WaRP board puts Comb720 on the level of big corporations because it has all the high-end parts of any normal smart watch. In the future, I hope to have a main board designed just for Comb720. The tessellation of hexagons allows the watch to display all the information needed in a very organized and space efficient manner. On typical smart watches, things move around and the user gets lost. However with Comb720 the OS only allows the user to get one page away from home making it so you can't get lost. While the OS for the Comb720 is very nice looking, it also has amazing reason behind it!

Comb720 will ship in two models: Comb720 Active and Comb720 Leather. Comb720 Leather is displayed above, it has a genuine leather strap and a metallic case. Comb720 Leather is just as nice as any fancy watch, except you get the added bonus of the revolutionary tessellation of hexagons! Comb720 Active has an athletic paracord watch band with an adjustable strap. It also has a gorgeous carbon fiber reinforced body, this makes Comb720 Active incredibly durable! I hope to make both models of Comb720 waterproof. At the moment I am talking about a waterproofing nano coating with a few different companies. 

What I Need &

I need $50,000 so that I can finalize the design for Comb720 and ready it for production. I will use this money to make a prototype, make the companion app, and finalize other payments. I have an amazing software engineer working for a very low price and I would love to have him work on the companion app too. If I raise enough funds, I will also hire someone to design a PCB (Printed Circuit Board) so that I don't have to use WaRP board. Lastly, I will use this money to ramp up production on Comb720 so I have capacity to produce them as needed. Please give me a hand and donate today!

My favorite perk to donating is the first prototype ever made! This watch will be my most valued possession and would be a nice addition to anyone's trophy room. Another awesome perk is designing your own watch face. Imagine how cool that would be to send me your drawings and have them turned into a watch face that any user can pick from. This watch face would be in the hands of consumers everywhere! The VIP Access perk is also pretty awesome. You will be able to redeem a coupon code to order a Comb720 before the general public. This means you will have the coolest new gadget that you can showoff to all your friends and family! The early bird Comb720 is sweet in my opinion because you are going to receive a wonderful smart watch before the general public can even buy it! How crazy is that?

The Impact

Your donation of any size would impact me forever! This is my dream, I have given all my money to the company and liquidated lots of my favorite things. I truly and honestly believe that with your support we can make Comb720 a smashing success. Comb720 will bring on a new era of simplicity for the smart watch industry. With my revolutionary seven tessellation design we will be able to change the smart watch industry forever. We can show the big corporations that simple is the new smart!

This project is valuable to you not only because of the perks, but because you know that you have changed my life forever. I will never forget the generosity you could show by just donating a simple five dollars. Please, if you feel able give me a hand, and let's change what consumers knows about simple!

column2:
Challenges

This project will have many challenges along the way, tons that I cannot even predict. One potential challenge is getting in touch with big manufacturers. They may not be open to business with a 7th grader. I think that if I get big enough where I can develop my own PCB (Printed Circuit Board) the manufactures will talk to a representative. Another challenge might be developing my own PCB for Comb720. However, I believe that if we hire a professional to develop the PCB there won't be any issues. There will also be plenty of other challenges along the way, but I believe that with your help we can bring Comb720 to market!

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

There are thousands of ways you can help if you can't pledge money! I always need more support so please spread the word to a friend or co-worker. Also be sure to share Comb720 on social media. Lastly, if you are an electrical engineer, software developer, or anybody who wants to give me some advice, I would LOVE to contact you!
","Look at What the Triangle Business Journal Said About Comb720-
Also Checkout What WRAL Wrote About Comb720-

Background Hello! My name is Davis and all my life I've had a passion for technology. I was often involved in projects such as building computers or making apps. I also really love honey bees! I have two bee hives, they are my pride and joy. I never thought these two passions could collide. One day, I was at the beach on cnet.com looking at smart watches and I realized just how un-user friendly they were. I decided I could create a smart watch that was easier to use and more efficient than all the cumbersome smart watches out at the time. That's when I had a vision! I saw a smart watch that used a tessellation of seven hexagons to put information right at a user's fingertips. After many hours of research and google sketchup renderings, Comb720 was born.

Comb720 currently runs off an open-source platform called WaRP board. WaRP board puts Comb720 on the level of big corporations because it has all the high-end parts of any normal smart watch. In the future, I hope to have a main board designed just for Comb720. The tessellation of hexagons allows the watch to display all the information needed in a very organized and space efficient manner. On typical smart watches, things move around and the user gets lost. However with Comb720 the OS only allows the user to get one page away from home making it so you can't get lost. While the OS for the Comb720 is very nice looking, it also has amazing reason behind it!

Comb720 will ship in two models: Comb720 Active and Comb720 Leather. Comb720 Leather is displayed above, it has a genuine leather strap and a metallic case. Comb720 Leather is just as nice as any fancy watch, except you get the added bonus of the revolutionary tessellation of hexagons! Comb720 Active has an athletic paracord watch band with an adjustable strap. It also has a gorgeous carbon fiber reinforced body, this makes Comb720 Active incredibly durable! I hope to make both models of Comb720 waterproof. At the moment I am talking about a waterproofing nano coating with a few different companies.    What I Need & What You Get

I need $50,000 so that I can finalize the design for Comb720 and ready it for production. I will use this money to make a prototype, make the companion app, and finalize other payments. I have an amazing software engineer working for a very low price and I would love to have him work on the companion app too. If I raise enough funds, I will also hire someone to design a PCB (Printed Circuit Board) so that I don't have to use WaRP board. Lastly, I will use this money to ramp up production on Comb720 so I have capacity to produce them as needed. Please give me a hand and donate today!

My favorite perk to donating is the first prototype ever made! This watch will be my most valued possession and would be a nice addition to anyone's trophy room. Another awesome perk is designing your own watch face. Imagine how cool that would be to send me your drawings and have them turned into a watch face that any user can pick from. This watch face would be in the hands of consumers everywhere! The VIP Access perk is also pretty awesome. You will be able to redeem a coupon code to order a Comb720 before the general public. This means you will have the coolest new gadget that you can showoff to all your friends and family! The early bird Comb720 is sweet in my opinion because you are going to receive a wonderful smart watch before the general public can even buy it! How crazy is that?

The Impact Your donation of any size would impact me forever! This is my dream, I have given all my money to the company and liquidated lots of my favorite things. I truly and honestly believe that with your support we can make Comb720 a smashing success. Comb720 will bring on a new era of simplicity for the smart watch industry. With my revolutionary seven tessellation design we will be able to change the smart watch industry forever. We can show the big corporations that simple is the new smart!

This project is valuable to you not only because of the perks, but because you know that you have changed my life forever. I will never forget the generosity you could show by just donating a simple five dollars. Please, if you feel able give me a hand, and let's change what consumers knows about simple!

Risks & Challenges This project will have many challenges along the way, tons that I cannot even predict. One potential challenge is getting in touch with big manufacturers. They may not be open to business with a 7th grader. I think that if I get big enough where I can develop my own PCB (Printed Circuit Board) the manufactures will talk to a representative. Another challenge might be developing my own PCB for Comb720. However, I believe that if we hire a professional to develop the PCB there won't be any issues. There will also be plenty of other challenges along the way, but I believe that with your help we can bring Comb720 to market!

Other Ways You Can Help There are thousands of ways you can help if you can't pledge money! I always need more support so please spread the word to a friend or co-worker. Also be sure to share Comb720 on social media. Lastly, if you are an electrical engineer, software developer, or anybody who wants to give me some advice, I would LOVE to contact you!
You can email me at dbarrow@honeycombservers.com

Hello! I'm Kylie, the creator of fashaholics.com. I'm equal parts computer-nerd and fashion lover, with a penchant for handmade and vintage pieces. I've always had an entrepreneurial drive and preferred taking the self-taught path. Consequently, I am drawn to the passionate do-it-yourself'ers: the artists, independents, and local business owners.

Fashion has been a part of my life significantly for the last ten years. I've opened and managed a modern/vintage buy-sell-trade store, an e-commerce store, and maintained a hobby of scouring thrift stores and flea markets for special home and wardrobe pieces.

In that time, I have also discovered my talents in web and graphic design. I create logos, print materials, websites and blogs for small businesses in my free time. I also monitor or advise them in social media marketing.

All of this has led me to where I am today. An intensely motivated lady with an idea that perfectly aligns my skills with my passions, creating a website that will not only intrigue and inspire other fashaholics, but also help build awareness and support for independent artists and small businesses.
fashaholics.com is your ultimate online fashion destination with:
• A comprehensive shopping guide - mapping out all the local and independently-owned shops and boutiques in hundreds of major cities nationwide (with plans to expand worldwide).

• An online boutique - featuring a highly-edited selection of handmade, vintage, and one-of-a-kind clothing, shoes, and accessories. You will find a variety of ever-changing merchandise from a diverse group of artists and designers.
• A daily blog and seasonal e-zine - delivered from a creative group of writers, photographers, stylists, illustrators, and more.

At this point, I've logged many hours planning, organizing and creating. I am within arms reach of sharing my dream with the world, but I need your help. I am looking for $5,000 in funding to assist with the startup process. In return, I'm giving out gift certificates and fashaholics goodies. Any help is immensely appreciated.
I like to do things that are a win-win. You scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
• I need $5,000 to help with startup costs (advertising, supplies, and promotional materials). It is vital that I get the word out and develop a strong web presence.
• If you donate, you're awesome. I'll show my gratitude in the form of goodies (stickers and such) and gift cards for the online shop!
• If I do not reach the goal of $5,000, I will still use the funds raised towards the startup...because every penny counts.
Everyone benefits, really. You get to enjoy:
• A new shop that is full of quality products, making it easier for you to find that special piece.
• An organized way to discover special, locally-owned spots for your next road trip or vacation.
• A wealth of information and inspiration from the blog and e-zine.

All the local shopkeepers and independent artists meet new customers and increase sales. The writers, photographers, and blog contributers gain publicity and awareness. Advertising is expensive, and this is a great opportunity for these hardworking companies and individuals to reach their target market.
And, I get to enjoy living the dream. Fashaholics is the fire in my belly and I love busting my butt making it awesome. All I want is the opportunity to continue doing so.
No cash? No sweat! I love you for even reading about fashaholics...and you can still help!
• Spread the word! Tell your friends, family, co-workers, or strangers on the street. I can even mail you business cards and stickers if you like.
• I'm accepting submissions from fashion bloggers, stylists, photographers, illustrators, or whatever form of creative outlet you use. E-mail kylie@fashaholics.com for more details.
• Fill out this survey so I can learn more about you and make the site better with your feedback.

You can connect with me via the links below....and THANK YOU for taking the time and consideration to help fashaholics.com.

We are the students of the University of Hawai'i at Manoa's Fashion Design and Merchandising Program.

Every year we feature the designs of our senior and junior designers. Our hope is to showcase the work of these promising, new designers and provide them with a memorable platform with which they will present their innovative and unique garments.

This year is our 48th Annual Senior Fashion Show, Reverie: Daydreams Set Adrift. Our goal is to make this year's show the best yet! If you are interested in helping us reach this goal, please continue reading about our special perks!

Our Designers

We are proud to present our senior designers this year, Camille Lanier, Amanda Casarez, Ashley Castro, Christine Om, Chelsea Otsuka, Tori Speere, and Sarah Yamashige. Alongside our senior designers, we are also featuring our junior designers, Danelle Agpaoa, Ayaka Hosomi, Keanu Kai Harrold-Ka'Aihue, Li King, Asia Mateo, Gabrielle Sanehira, and Nara Nellis.

Funds + Perks

Please help us make this show a reality. Any donation would be greatly appreciated!

All proceeds will directly fund the production of this show. Venue, visuals, and audio are all necessary to bring this event to life.

Perks! Preorder your Reverie Show Day DVD with a minimum donation of $15 :)

Want to order more than one DVD? Please follow these instructions:
1) Click ""Contribute Now.""

2) Please fill out how much you would like to contribute. If you would like more than one DVD please fill-in the appropriate amount in increments of $15. For example: 2 DVDs would be a $30 donation and 5 DVDs would be a $75 donation.
3) When selecting a perk, please click ""Reverie Fashion Show DVD.""
4) Fill-out your Contact Information and Shipping Information.
5) After going through the payment process, please leave a comment on our main page.
6) In the comment, please state your name (same as in Shipping Info) and the number of DVDs you would like. Once it's posted, you're all done!
Your contribution puts us another step closer to creating this spectacular fashion show.
Please help us get the word out about our campaign.
We are so grateful for any kind of contribution you can make. This show would not be a success without the support of people like you! Thank you for all your time and have an awesome day! :)

Detroit Pout™: Our top-selling Crave Lip Hit™  Lip Veneer with a Motor City makeover. The perfect pink/mauve nude just got a little more dangerous and little more sexy and a little more glam. It's so fab that you'll just have to wait until you receive it to see what we're actually cooking up for this Whip Hand favorite. Available only as a perk to our IndieGoGo supporters. This color will only be made once for this campaign. Once it is gone, it is gone. Photo represents base shade, not final finish.
column5:
>

Whip Hand Cosmetics and Clean: Brush Shampoo Founder JessicaOchs have joined forces to create a one-of-a-kind, Limited Edition Whip Hand Cosmetics ""Maile"" Scented Clean Brush Shampoo available only to our IndieGoGo supporters.  

Maile is a fragrant vine native to the Pacific Islands used for decoration and in Hawaiian leis. Whip Hand Cosmetics Founder and Chief Makeup Artists Riese Lauriat (a native of Hawaii) chose this scent because it's gender-neutral and the scent of Maile reminds her of warm breezes,  blue oceans and tropical beauty. 

This Goats Milk Brush Shampoo cleans, conditions and whitens makeup brushes like nothing you’ve ever experienced.  A cult favorite of Pro Makeup Artists, the scent of Maile in this Limited Edition Brush Shampoo can make even the coldest day in Detroit (or anywhere else) feel a little less frigid.

column2: >We no longer live in a leisurely age…the impression must be immediate,strong and complete--color has this vital power.”
column3:
> Wirt C. Rowland, Head Designer of the Guardian Building, Detroit, 1927

Inspiredby the bold Art Deco architecture and stunning Pewabic Pottery lobby ofDetroit’s Landmark Guardian Skyscraper, the DECO-ED OUT™  Loose Eyeshadow Collection replicates the vibrancy of one of the world’s most striking examples of Art Deco Architecture.  

A combo of rich jewel tones and neutrals, DECO-ED OUT can be blended for a daytime look, dramatic night out or the perfect Smokey Eye. 

You will receive four (4), 3 gram loose, high-pigment eyeshadows packaged in Whip Hand's signature glass vials, each Made with Attitude (and ♥) in Detroit.  

Available only as a perk to our IndieGoGo supporters. These colors will only be made once.True originals just like the Guardian Building Itself.  Final colors will be determined upon completion of the campaign.

Inspired by the Pewabic Pottery mosaic lobby of the historic Guardian Building in Downtown Detroit, this four color crème eyeshadow collection captures the spirit of the Roaring 20s and is designed to complement the Detroit Deco Limited Edition Loose Eyeshadow Collection.  

Available only once as perk to our IndieGoGo supporters, the formulas for these colors will never be used again. Final colors will be determined upon completion of the campaign. But don't worry ... they will be stunning!

column3:
>Once these are gone, the Detroit Beauty Box goes for $275. Plus, all Detroit Beauty box supporters will have their lips and name permanently displayed in our new Detroit Cosmetics Factory (we'll be in touch with you after the campaign to get your lip imprint.)

Now you can tell the world you have your own lipstick! 

Whip Hand Cosmetics will work with you to design your very own customized Lip Hit™ Lip Veneer shade. 

Our Lip Veneers go on like liquid lipstick with full, opaque coverage. Tweak one of our existing colors or let us create an entirely new color just for you. We’ll even name the shade after you, or we’ll work with you to name it “Whip Hand” style. You will receive five of your final production Lip Hits for yourself and friends and your shade will be available for future purchase on the Whip Hand Cosmetics website as part of our “Detroit Beauty”Collection.

Join the Official Whip Hand Cosmetics Fashion Week Makeup Team as a Makeup Artist at Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week NYC or Miami Swim during the 2014/2015 fashion week season (Fall or Spring Show, depending on specific Whip Hand designer sponsorship.) You will also receive Whip Hand Cosmetics gratis product as part of being on the Fashion Week Team.  Does not include travel expenses.

You and a friend will join Whip Hand Cosmetics as our guest at Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week NYC or Miami Swim during the 2014/2015 Fashion Week season (Fall or Spring Show, depending on specific Whip Hand designer sponsorship.)Join us backstage where the magic happens and get seats on the runway for the show. Designer TBD.  Does not include travel expenses.

The perfect perk for the aspiring model or woman who always secretly wanted to be on the cover of Vogue (though we can’t promise that.) 


Join Whip Hand Cosmetics on-location in Detroit and appear in one of our 2014 beauty advertising campaigns. You will receive full-makeup, hair, nail and wardrobe services for the shoot and your face will appear alongside other gorgeous Whip Hand Cosmetics faces in advertising, on our website, packaging and promotional materials. Does not include travel expenses.

Whip Hand Cosmetics Founder and Chief Makeup Artist, Riese Lauriat, will fly to you anywhere in the Continental United States or Canada for a personalized, day-long makeover and makeup lesson session for you and five of your friends. 

You and your friends will each receive Whip Hand Cosmetics makeup boxes loaded with Made in Detroit Makeup handpicked for each of you by Riese.  This can also be redeemed for a Wedding or Special Event. You pick the time and place and Riese will be there to make you and your friends look fabulous.

Whip Hand Cosmetics Founder and Chief Makeup Artists Riese Lauriat (a native of Hawaii) chose this scent because it's gender-neutral and the scent of Maile reminds her of warm breezes,  blue oceans and tropical beauty. This Goats Milk Brush Shampoo cleans, conditions and whitens makeup brushes like nothing you’ve ever experienced.  A cult favorite of Pro Makeup Artists, the scent of Maile in this Limited Edition Brush Shampoo can make even the coldest day in Detroit (or anywhere else) feel a little less frigid.

We no longer live in a leisurely age…the impression must be immediate,strong and complete--color has this vital power.”  Wirt C. Rowland, Head Designer of the Guardian Building, Detroit, 1927Inspiredby the bold Art Deco architecture and stunning Pewabic Pottery lobby ofDetroit’s Landmark Guardian Skyscraper, the DECO-ED OUT™  Loose Eyeshadow Collection replicates the vibrancy of one of the world’s most striking examples of Art Deco Architecture.  A combo of rich jewel tones and neutrals, DECO-ED OUT can be blended for a daytime look, dramatic night out or the perfect Smokey Eye. You will receive four (4), 3 gram loose, high-pigment eyeshadows packaged in Whip Hand's signature glass vials, each Made with Attitude (and ♥) in Detroit.  Available only as a perk to our IndieGoGo supporters. These colors will only be made once.True originals just like the Guardian Building Itself.  Final colors will be determined upon completion of the campaign. Show your support for the City that was once known as ""The Paris of the West"" and its remarkable comeback story by rocking one of these gorgeous, Limited Edition Whip Hand tees. Made of high-quality viscous polyester jersey, this gorgeous, lightweight Bella flowy draped sleeve Dolman T-Shirt is the ultimate in comfort and style. These exact designs will never be produced again. Only available to our IndieGoGo supporters.Colors: Black, Dark Heather Grey, Pebble BrownDesigns: CITIES, WHIP HAND DETROIT™ , DETROIT BEAUTY™ , MAKE UPDETROIT™  We will contact you after claiming your perk to gather size,color and design.  These fabulous, Limited Edition Bella Flowy, Whisper-Knit Fashion Tanks are made of high-quality viscous polyester jersey and combine an A-line body with shirring at its racerback seam. The PERFECT oversized tank to be worn over leggings or jeans. Add heels and a leather jacket to unleash your inner rocker girl. These exact designs will never be produced again. Only available to our IndieGoGo supporters.Colors: Black, Dark Grey Heather, WhiteDesigns: CITIES, WHIP HAND DETROIT™ , DETROIT BEAUTY™ , MAKE UPDETROIT™  We will contact you after claiming your perk to gather size,color and design.  Detroit-style made a little sporty with this cropped, boxy T-Shirt. Made of high-quality viscous/polyester blend. These exact designs will never be produced again. Only available to our IndieGoGo supporters.Colors: Black, Dark Grey Heather, Athletic Grey, RedDesigns: CITIES, WHIP HAND DETROIT™ , DETROIT BEAUTY™ , MAKE UPDETROIT™  We will contact you after claiming your perk to gather size, color and design.The crème eyeshadow companion to the DECO-ED OUT™  LooseEyeshadow Collection. Inspired by the Pewabic Pottery mosaic lobby of the historic Guardian Building in Downtown Detroit, this four color crème eyeshadow collection captures the spirit of the Roaring 20s and is designed to complement the Detroit Deco Limited Edition Loose Eyeshadow Collection.  Available only once as perk to our IndieGoGo supporters, the formulas for these colors will never be used again. Final colors will be determined upon completion of the campaign. But don't worry ... they will be stunning!When we asked our fans to choose their favorite style and design for our IndieGoGo Limited Edition T-Shirt Collection, this style was the clear winner. We understand why: Relaxed and still sexy (if you want it to be), this top can be worn so many different ways. Whether on or off the shoulder, it can be paired with everything from a skirt, to jeans, to tights or leggings for the perfect Detroit-inspired street look. P.S. Mile-high stilettos can never hurt.These exact designs will never be produced again.Only available to our IndieGoGo supporters. Colors: Black, Dark Grey Heather, Pebble Brown.Designs: WHIP HAND DETROIT™ , DETROIT BEAUTY™ , MAKE UP DETROIT™  We will contact you after claiming your perk to gather size,color and design.  Be the first to get the complete Limited Edition Whip Hand Cosmetics Detroit IndieGoGo DECO-ED OUT™  Collection, plus a ton of other delicious Whip Hand Perks (including unreleased products like our new IGNITE™  Illuminating Highlighter and Eye Primer/Lip Conditioner duo pack.) The Detroit Beauty Box includes the following:
Limited Edition ""Detroit Pout"" Lip Hit Lip Veneer
Limited Edition DECO-ED OUT Four Color Loose Pigment Eyeshadow Collection
Limited Edition DECO-ED OUT Four Color Crème Eyeshadow Palette
Whip Hand Cosmetics ""Set The Stage"" Makeup Primer
Our unreleased Whip Hand“Ignite” Illuminating Highlighter
Our unreleased Whip Hand Eye Primer/Lip Conditioner Duo Pack
Your choice of any two of our Limited Edition Whip Hand IndieGoGo Detroit Fashion Tees.

This is truly an amazing Perk worth more than $300 in Whip Hand Product and Swag. Two hundred early supporters get it for $225. Once these are gone, the Detroit Beauty Box goes for $275. Plus, all Detroit Beauty box supporters will have their lips and name permanently displayed in our new Detroit Cosmetics Factory (we'll be in touch with you after the campaign to get your lip imprint.)Now you can tell the world you have your own lipstick! Whip Hand Cosmetics will work with you to design your very own customized Lip Hit™ Lip Veneer shade. Our Lip Veneers go on like liquid lipstick with full, opaque coverage. Tweak one of our existing colors or let us create an entirely new color just for you. We’ll even name the shade after you, or we’ll work with you to name it “Whip Hand” style. You will receive five of your final production Lip Hits for yourself and friends and your shade will be available for future purchase on the Whip Hand Cosmetics website as part of our “Detroit Beauty”Collection.Join the Official Whip Hand Cosmetics Fashion Week Makeup Team as a Makeup Artist at Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week NYC or Miami Swim during the 2014/2015 fashion week season (Fall or Spring Show, depending on specific Whip Hand designer sponsorship.) You will also receive Whip Hand Cosmetics gratis product as part of being on the Fashion Week Team.  Does not include travel expenses.You and a friend will join Whip Hand Cosmetics as our guest at Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week NYC or Miami Swim during the 2014/2015 Fashion Week season (Fall or Spring Show, depending on specific Whip Hand designer sponsorship.)Join us backstage where the magic happens and get seats on the runway for the show. Designer TBD.  Does not include travel expenses.The perfect perk for the aspiring model or woman who always secretly wanted to be on the cover of Vogue (though we can’t promise that.) Join Whip Hand Cosmetics on-location in Detroit and appear in one of our 2014 beauty advertising campaigns. You will receive full-makeup, hair, nail and wardrobe services for the shoot and your face will appear alongside other gorgeous Whip Hand Cosmetics faces in advertising, on our website, packaging and promotional materials. Does not include travel expenses. Whip Hand Cosmetics Founder and Chief Makeup Artist, Riese Lauriat, will fly to you anywhere in the Continental United States or Canada for a personalized, day-long makeover and makeup lesson session for you and five of your friends. You and your friends will each receive Whip Hand Cosmetics makeup boxes loaded with Made in Detroit Makeup handpicked for each of you by Riese.  This can also be redeemed for a Wedding or Special Event. You pick the time and place and Riese will be there to make you and your friends look fabulous.",46.0,2,"1 Campaign
We did it! We hit our initial goal of $7500! We're so grateful and excited that so many people are on board and believe in the brand.

That so many of you, from so many cities and countries around the world,  have so enthusiastically embraced us and sent us you love and hard earned cash is a testament to how underserved we are when it comes to alternative masculine styled clothing options. Every comment you wrote on here, on our facebook, twitter and in emails inspires us all over again that this is something important our community really needs.
Its not over yet. We need to make it to $16,000 to launch a full scale production run in our factory and produce more stock than what has been pre-ordered so that the online store can begin to run.
Please, keep shopping the pre-sale and keep sharing! Together we are making this happen!
Sending all my love and thanks to everyone that has been a part of this!
Kreuzbach 10 makes men's shirts, cut to fit women's bodies.

We don't like to say we make women's shirts, because that makes us sound like a lot of other labels who take a button up shirt, feminize it with girly colours  and patterns and maybe even add some frilly bits then still have the nerve to call it 'man style.'
Our shirts are designed to be straight up what you'd expect to find in the men's department
column2:
Primary colours, geometric patterns, no frills.
However unlike shirts in the men's department Kreuzbach10 shirts are cut to fit female bodies. We know that women's shoulders, chests, waists and hips are in different ratios to men, but furthermore in different ratios to each other. That’s why we have developed our core 3 cuts that cater to different body shapes and we hope to expand to more cuts the brand grows. We're clear about which shirt is which cut, so if you buy one that fits you like a glove, its easy to find more that will make you look just as hot.

column1:
We've stood in the men's change room in briefs and a tux shirt cursing because anything that does up comfortably on our hips looks like a potato sack on the rest of our body.
We've stood in the women's change room wondering if any brand will make something actually designed to fit comfortably cover a bust rather than be splayed open.

We know that it can feel like the entire world of 'fashion' is going out of their way to make you feel out of place if you’re not a girly girl but we want you to know that we think you’re awesome just the way you are.
So awesome that we’re making clothes just for you.
The Mini Milestone: What K10 Can Achieve With $7500

With $7500 K10 will be back in the black. We've borrowed funds to begin getting samples made. We realized early on that you, our potential customers, need to see what the shirts actually going to be like before you want to pre-order or support our business. It was a bit of a 'the chicken or the egg' scenario, we had the genesis of the business, but no funds to make samples, and without samples to show people not much chance of getting financed, so we went out on a limb and borrowed money to get the ball rolling.

The process of getting professional factory standard prototypes developed, and having them tweaked into samples that are pretty much ready to roll with an order have cost us almost $3000. We've had a bunch of smaller costs associated with getting the business set up to function, things like domain registration, online store software, hosting, and then some costs associated with marketing and promotion (eco-print business cards and flyers, paying the sexy model and talented creatives that helped with the photoshoot) that have crept up to just over $1000.

If we raise the $7500, we will 100% still deliver on any rewards that people have been promised. Hats, posters and stickers will all come out as planned. For the actual shirts it means doing a limited edition run of shirts in one or two styles so that everyone who claimed a shirt as a reward will still get one. As we won't have made minimum numbers for the factory we've been working with, these will be produced in Australia at a much higher cost per unit. Depending on the ratio of shirt rewards to other rewards claimed, we anticipate that will take up the remaining $3.5K of the funds raised.

If we hit the $7500 we'll consider our crowdfunding campaign run a success. We'll have gone from a little idea to a registered business, with a network of supporters and contacts. But more than that, we'll have patterns and prototypes ready to go, and we'll have proven that we have an audience. This puts us in a great position to apply to financial institutions and/or Angel Investors for the capital to launch our first full scale production run in early 2013.
The Tipping Point: What K10 Can Achieve With $16000

If we raise $16K we'll have the capital to cover all of the earlier expenses aaaaand do our first production run! Hurrah! You can buy awesome Kreuzbach10 shirts that make you look sexy, in a slick online store, as early as December! Our first collection will go into production in November and any pre-ordered shirts will be shipped in early/mid December (in time for the Judeo-Christian Holiday season, if you're that way inclined!) We'll be able to provide everyone who has selected 'shirt' as a reward with a choice of 3-4 designs (minimum!) and we'll also be able to produce more shirts than have been ordered,so the online store can go live with more shirts for you and your friends and family to buy. The sales from this stock will then provide the capital for producing more shirts, and then from those more again. We'll be able to fund successive collections from the one prior and so be able to grow without running more fundraising campaigns.
The Real Goal: What K10 Can Achieve with $32000

With $32 000 we can double our production run! What does this mean? It means more shirts to choose from. We will be able to meet minimum production numbers on more styles, so right from the start we can launch a minimum of 3-4 different designs in the Smart Casual Collection and a minimum 3-4 designs in the Special Occasions Collection. Pending negotiations with our factory, what we'd be pushing for is 6 styles in each collection. It means if you've claimed a shirt as a reward you'll have a lot more to choose from, and a lot more to buy later too. It means much larger scale of operation, which means more momentum for continued growth and a rapid increase in the amount and styles of shirts available so right from December this year into the start of 2013 you have more chance of finding shirts in our collection that match exactly what you've been dreaming of.

More excitingly, when we hit $32000 we'll have the funds to develop patterns for plus size styles. One of our biggest disappointments so far is that we haven't been able to afford do this right from the start. Our current patterns are scaled for an Australian 6-16 (US 2-12, UK 4-14, Germany 30-40 France 32-42) but we're keen to accommodate ladies who wear bigger sizes. This will mean that pattern development for these can start immediately, and we'll produce the same styles in larger sizes as early as the second production run. This is really important to the ethos of Kreuzbach10. We don't want anyone to be left out.
What if Dreams Come True?: If we raise $33000 or more!

If we raise more than 33k Kreuzbach10 may be coming to a city near you! With our global business model, we're committed long term to an online model of operation to keep costs low and keep the shirts as cheap as possible, and also to make the brand accessible to everyone that wants it, no matter where they are in the world. For these reasons we're not looking to rent a permanent retail space anywhere, but we're keen to tour a few pop up shops around the world to reach out to people that may be a bit unsure about online shopping.

What is a pop up shop? An exciting temporary retail space. We're already exploring the possibility of touring a few European Capital cities in the second half of 2013 and setting up exciting mini shops for people to visit and try things on and chat about the brand. (As well as exciting specials, giveaways and maybe some entertainment!

Spread the word! Let your friends know about our brand. Our stretch goals seem a bit big and scary at the moment but to reach $16000 we really only need 160 people to claim a shirt as a reward. Thats 5 people per day from anywhere in the world for the duration of the campaign.
We did it! We hit our initial goal of $7500! We're so grateful and excited that so many people are on board and believe in the brand.

That so many of you, from so many cities and countries around the world,  have so enthusiastically embraced us and sent us you love and hard earned cash is a testament to how underserved we are when it comes to alternative masculine styled clothing options. Every comment you wrote on here, on our facebook, twitter and in emails inspires us all over again that this is something important our community really needs.
Its not over yet. We need to make it to $16,000 to launch a full scale production run in our factory and produce more stock than what has been pre-ordered so that the online store can begin to run.
Please, keep shopping the pre-sale and keep sharing! Together we are making this happen!
Sending all my love and thanks to everyone that has been a part of this!

Note: All Perks include shipping to the U.S. and there are extra instructions for international shipping.  All Perks are less then what retail will be...so be sure to be the first and get yours now!

The Quaffer is a patented Double Bubble Shot Glass with a built-in chaser that allows two liquids to stay separated.  The Glass Quaffer measures 2.25oz on the bottom and 1oz on top. You put any chaser in the bottom and any liquor on top. The liquids will stay separated until consumed.

The Quaffer works because liquor is less dense then most sugar based chasers, so the liquids want to stay separated.  The design and shape of the glass keeps them separated.  You pour the chaser to the neck of the glass, then when pouring the liquor, as long as you don’t pour directly in the hole, the liquor will stay separated until consumed.
Tilt your head back, let the liquids flow and enjoy!  The Quaffer is guaranteed to be the best shot you've ever had!

I designed and patented the Quaffer over 10 years ago while I was attending Arizona State University.  Originally I had the Glass Quaffers made in Italy, but four years later I wanted to bring the production of the Glass to the U.S.A.  I found a manufacturer to produce the Glass Quaffer and have had them made in America ever since.

column2: >

column1: Although the Quaffer has been around for over 10 years we had a setback a year and a half ago when our glass company suddenly stopped manufacturing the Glass.  For the last year and a half we have searched for a new manufacturer, but with no success.  There have been offers from overseas companies, but we wanted to keep the quality and durability of the glass as high as possible by having them produced here in the U.S.A.!

After much discussion and putting our heads together we have come up with a solution that will allow us to get the GLASS Quaffers produced here in the U.S.A. again.  We opened the middle hole that keeps the liquids separated from .85” to 1” and guess what...it worked!  It worked so well, the GLASS now pours easier and drinks better!

The manufacturer is ready to produce the glass again!  Unfortunately, with a year and a half of no glass sales we do not have the funds for the production run.  So, we are turning to you for help.   With your support we can Bring the Glass Back!

Thanks to Indiegogo and because of you, as soon as we are funded we can get the production run lined up!  This means the glass production day could be as soon as the day the campaign ends!  So, you should see your new and improved Quaffer Glasses by the first or second week in October!
$1 - We will email you the new recipe card!
$5 - We will send you a new recipe card and a “I brought the GLASS back” sticker!
$12 - Limited edition first “I brought the glass back” printed glass!  Yep, we will also include a recipe card and sticker! (includes shipping in the U.S.)  (limited to 1296)
$18 - Don’t drink alone!  Get 2 new and improved Quaffer glasses!  Of course we will also include 2 recipe cards and 2 stickers! (includes shipping in the U.S.)
$30 - Every house needs a set!  4 New and improved Quaffer glasses!  You will obviously be getting 4 recipe cards and 4stickers! (includes shipping in the U.S.)

$50 – Personalized set of 4!  You tell us what you want on your new Glass Quaffers.  All four can be different, so if you want a different name or saying on each one…you got it!  Of course the recipe cards and stickers are included! (includes shipping in the U.S.) (limited to 324)

$60 - Don’t forget about your friends, family and people you REALLY care about.  Get 10 new and improved glasses.  What do you think…10 recipe cards and 10 stickers…OK! (includes shipping in the U.S.)
$175 – Bars, nightclubs, retailers…this one’s for you!  72 High Quality Quaffer Bomb Shot Glasses!  Set yourself apart…be the cool place in town! (available only for the 48 states)
$300 – A full gross of 144 in case that’s how you roll! (available only for the 48 states)
$450 - 144 printed glass! (available only for the 48 states)

Ariafritta is a project of Lisa and Francesca, former classmates and friends, now also business partners. Ariafritta has arisen from a feeling for creating: thinking, designing and making. We create handbags and accessories that we would like to wear every day.

We started our project in June 2012, designing and making our first collection which was launched in September. We got a great success among friends and friends of friends. Two months later we were already participating to an exhibition in Venice. Since then, our idea grown and now we would like to make Ariafritta more real. We want to open a studio where creating, making and promoting our work…a place where people can stop by to see, talk and collaborate.
What we need and what you get

We are here to raise money to fund our project. Since June 2012 we put every penny we earned from others projects/activities in Ariafritta, we self-fund our first collection,public relations and website...and then the first collection fund the second one…
but now we are at a turning point.
We need to grow,and this is why we decided to make this campaign!

Every penny you donate will be invested in all those annoying but necessary bureaucratic practises and taxes required to create a company, a studio to rent, professional sewing machines, desks, tools and everything we need to make Ariafritta a small local business with a global attitude.
We are only asking what we need right now and every little bit will be useful for us.
The funds will be use as follow:

We create a series of products just for our supporters...perks that you’ll be able to get through indiegogo. Postcards, tshirt, shoppers and other stuff…from 5 euros up to much more.  However,what we  give you in return will be nothing compared to what you did for us. Your support will make our project real.
Money is not everything….any help will be appreciate it! Spread the word, tell your friends, let’s create a network.

My name is April Howard and I am a fashion designer working on my Fall/Winter 2014 collection. It is my dream to launch my new line in New York and be able to work on it full-time.

I just finished this amazing business program in Oakland called Women's Initiative, which helped me write my business plan and get my business side in line with my creative side. I am excited to put my plan into action and move back to New York to launch my line.

I have over 10 years of experience working in the apparel and home furnishings industries. In 2003, I graduated from The Fashion Institute of Technology with a degree in textile design. After FIT, I worked at Ralph Lauren in their textile and home department.

In 2006, I moved to San Francisco to pursue a degree at the Academy of Art. While in school, I fell in love with draping on the dress form and knew I never wanted to do anything else.  During the summer of 2009, I worked with Rodarte in Los Angeles, and stayed on to work with the company during four seasons of Fashion Week in New York.
In 2010, I graduated from the Academy of Art and began selling my line at Harputs and The Factory in San Francisco.
Unfortunately, I have never been able to fully focus on my line because I am always working a full-time day job. This campaign will help me focus my efforts and launch my line whole-heartedly!!
This campaign will fund my Fall 2014 Collection. With your help we can:
• Produce first samples of 15 new looks for Fall 2014
• Buy fabric for samples and final production
• Photograph and put together look books for my line (a catalog for buyers if you will)
• Purchase necessary machines and dress forms: 1 straight stitch machine, 1 serger, 2 dress forms, a cutting table
• Hire my interns so that they can be paid employees!

For everyone that contributes to this campaign I will give you something back. The perks range from a hand written note card and illustration to our sexy best-selling leather jacket. Other rewards include our new print silk dresses, drapey skirts, hand-made leather coin purses and wallets. Everyone will of course receive a giant hug!!
If we do not reach our entire goal we will adjust the number of garments we make, for example instead of doing 15 new styles for Fall 2014 we will do 10.

With each contribution you will not only help launch our new collection and get a fun sexy reward-you will also help support other small businesses. 2% of our profits will go to Women's Initiative, a non-profit organization that helps low-income women write a business plan and successfully start their own business.

I am very excited for this project and know that it will be successful with your help. In the past I have done fundraising for my line and am always amazed by the support of my friends, family and other colleagues. When I was finishing graduate school I raised $10,000 to finish my final collection with the gracious help of my friends and family.
In case you can't contribute there are still ways you can help out:
• You can simply get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
• You can host a pledge night at your house.
• Donate some free time you have to help make some rewards.
• Pay attention to my cat while I am busy sewing.

When we launched our first product in 2016 we were 3... Today we're 18 and our team is made up of optical PhDs, world-class engineers, software developers and designers who have worked for Peugeot (Car Manufacturer), Intel, Parrot, or for firefighters on products like the Oakley Radar Pace and the Intel Vaunt smart glasses.

Since our first product, we’ve worked very hard on improving every aspect of our company. We’ve hired multigenerational talented people from all over the world. We draw on their differences, their culture and how they think to create the most successful product for biker safety.

Created by ex-BMW & Airbus optics and photonics PhD engineers. EyeRide is a Patented all-in-one device that combines head-up display, GPS, hands-free kit and voice command to keep your eyes on the road. Save 4.2 seconds* of reaction time while using HUD technology instead of a smartphone. * French Public Safety Organization Metrics.      EyeRide already passed US, EU & CA regulations to make sure you get the protection you need while riding. The safety you can trust.  We launched our first product in 2017. Since then we collected more than 3000 backer's feedback. Helmet compatibility. Riding content. EyeRide is made of the very best of customer's experiences and our team industrialization's expertise.

Stay Focused! EyeRide displays Google Maps and Plans in your line of sight. It is bright, it is transparent, so you can focus on riding curves. Our 55mm 99dB flat speakers and directional microphone ensure a powerful sound experience and connectivity with other riders. Spotify & Youtube music are available in order to keep your best vibes.
We integrated the smallest Nano HD OLED Technology. True Black means 100% image transparency and crisp colors. It brings 3000 nits brightness: that’s 3x better than your iPhone against the sun.
We've dramatically reduced the size of the device, so it fits perfectly in any helmet and is truly easy to set-up. You will only need 128 seconds to install EyeRide in your helmet.
Place the smallest 5.0 Bluetooth button on your handlebar and change your music from any apps. 2 years autonomy. Stick it directly wherever you want.

Super limited full option pack. The first custom-fit carbon helmet. Lighter (1,1kg). Share your exact morphology later. This helmet is not available in the U.S yet. Empowered with EyeRide head-up display. Controlled with a handlebar push.

Since our first launch in 2016, we've brought 2 head-up display on the market (1 for motorcycles and 1 for cars). Based on our experience, we've selected world-class partners to reduce production time and deliver the best product quality.

column2:
>Introducing the Grand New Yorker:
A luxury timepiece built with quality components, featuring a high-end sweep secondhand movement &
column3: quick-release leather straps.
column4: >The Grand New Yorker is the most iconic timepiece ever inspired by New York City.
column6: />Actor and musician Burn Gorman from the BBC series Torchwood, the HBO series Game of Thrones, the blockbuster Pacific Rim and The Dark Knight Rises - for the Grand New Yorker.
column7:
>The Grand New Yorker was inspired by New York's cult clock installed in the main hall at the Grand Central Terminal on East 42nd Street. The custom-made bold hands were inspired by New York's iconic skyline and support perfect readability.
At twelve 'o clock (and once every hour, too), when the three hands overlap each other, the silhouette of the Chrysler Building is outlined. In their time, the Grand Central Terminal was the largest railway hub in the world, while the Chrysler Building was the tallest skyscraper. Both landmarks became symbols of firsts.
column8: >Our inspiration was New York in the ‘30s, the time that set the foundations of what New York stands for today: hard-working immigrants, liberty, fine journalism, the creative industry, self-made men, skyscrapers, and the sexual revolution – just to name a few. And lets not forget to mention New York's music heritage too, from Fats Waller to George Gershwin.
column63: >If you think about it, New York doesn't have a watch. Sure, there are many famous brands in New York that make watches, but these timepieces are a reflection of these brands and not a symbol of NYC itself. We did not want to use clichéd solutions, and definitely wanted to have a black and white design.
column65: >Every component of the Grand New Yorker is custom-made, from its thick stainless steel case to the very last detail on the dial. We selected only the finest materials and paid attention to first-class details.
column66: >The Grand New Yorker watch collection is brought to life with the help of our excellent suppliers and highly reputable factories that manufacture goods for global luxury brands in the watch industry.
column67:
>Watch case: Stainless steel
Water resistant: 3 ATM, 30 meters
Glass: Domed glass with anti-scratch surface finish
Strap size: 20 mm, best fit for 14 - 22 cm wrist
Watch size (diameter / thickness): 40 mm / 9 mm
Movement: Japanese quartz movement
Strap: Soft nappa leather
Buckle: Stainless steel pin buckle
Warranty: 2 year limited warranty against manufacturing defects
column68: >The Grand New Yorker features a unique, battery-operated quartz movement made in Japan, featuring a sweeping secondhand.
column69: >Unlike conventional quartz movements, where the secondhand hits just once per second, our innovative movement hits four times. Today, the Grand New Yorker is one of the rare watches that feature this innovative technology, which gives the timepiece the feel of a luxury automatic Swiss watch without an expensive price tag and the hassle of winding the watch every day. The fluid movement is a reflection of Frank Sinatra's city that never sleeps.
column70:
>Pictures of the watches are real photos taken from prototypes
(not digital renders).
column71: >Classic Grand New Yorker / White
column72: >Roman Grand New Yorker / White
column73: >Classic Grand New Yorker / Black
column74: >Roman Grand New Yorker / Black
column75: >The Grand New Yorker comes with a super-soft, nappa leather strap that can easily be changed by its clever spring bar without special tools.
column77: >If you would like to reach us, please email us at info-at-aronnewyork-dot-com

column2: >Aron is a startup democratic luxury brand. We founded Aron with one wish – to empower like-minded people to create beyond.
column3: >New York City is the centerpiece of our universe. Nothing compares to her and you won't find a better match for genius. At Aron, we turn everyday objects into relevant statements through an original design language that is inspired by New York City’s cosmopolitan mindset, and its timeless elegance.
column4: >Behind our brand stands a founder with a refined taste for craft and an experienced eye for quality. Aron's designs are elegant and intelligent, yet have a recognizable voice that appeals to all genders.
column23: >One Last Thing - We've Got a Little More to Tell You
column24: >The hands of the Grand New Yorker form a half compass and a half square, the basic tools of creating buildings and the main tools of the masonic craft. According to masonic symbolism, the square is an emblem of virtue in which we must ""square our actions by the square of virtue with all mankind.” The compasses exemplify the wisdom of our conduct and the strength to ""circumscribe our desires and keep our passions within due bounds.” When these two tools are placed together, peace and harmony is the result.
column26:
>The creator of this project would like to gratefully thank the outstanding support from Mr. Burn Gorman. Special thanks to my firends, who not only believed in this project but worked so hard to make it happen.

column2: >

>Tired of other other brands limiting your options? Can't find that perfect combination? We believe in an abundance of choice to help you find your perfect watch. Take a look at all of our options and find YOURS by using our fully functional WATCH BUILDER, available at this link:

>We are a pair of engineering students with a shared passion: elegant, stylish and minimal wristwatches. After becoming frustrated with what is available on the market within the constraints of quality, design, personalization and affordability, we set out to build the perfect watch which raises the bar in these four fields.

>We pursued a design inspired by a theme and a meaning - essentially having a character yet being undeniably classic and timeless. This brought a new design language to the watch world. Not only just a new look, but one drawn from history.

>The history of the wrist watch dates back to 1810, however its popularity was solely among women. It only became popular among men during the Anglo Boer war due to its convenience. This era also marks the birth of the propeller aircraft. In World War One both the propeller aircraft and the wrist watch were officially issued to aid and implement new strategies.

>The wrist watch used alongside aircraft in their early beginnings created the theme and character inspiration used to design our watches. Using premium materials, the watches succeed in defining elegance in simplicity drawn from the design of the trench watches and early propeller aircraft.

>We aim to offer timepieces that are luxurious, affordable and customizable in a way that any individual can add their own unique touch of personality. Help us raise funds for our first few production runs. With additional pledges beyond our goal, we aim to create a much larger and more diverse range of straps (including adding color schemes and new materials) and a new watch model before the end of the year.

>One watch may not suit all outfits. Buying multiple watches may prove to be unaffordable. We provide a solution by offering an extensive and diverse variety of fully interchangeable straps, allowing you to switch your look with ease, in no time at all. Having one watch with the three different types of band we offer gives you three unique styles – a more classic look with Italian leather, stainless-steel mesh for high-class and nylon for the casual summer style.

>Passion doesn’t stop at beauty. We have a profound passion for quality. Using superior quartz movements made by the Seiko Epson Corporation, 316L Stainless Steel, fine Italian leather, premium mesh and scratch-proof sapphire crystal glass demands a high end price tag from competitors - we offer all of these at a price that people can afford, and thus a watch you can wear on your wrist daily, rather than remaining behind a display.

>We are so confident in the quality of our timepieces and premium materials, that we back each unit with a two year warranty. Should anything happen within the first two years, please send it back to us and we will replace it with a new one*. We promise great customer service, so you can always be assured to have any issue handled quickly and efficiently.
>*Warranty does not cover accidental damage, battery life or wear and tear.

column1: ","Tired of other other brands limiting your options? Can't find that perfect combination? We believe in an abundance of choice to help you find your perfect watch. Take a look at all of our options and find YOURS by using our fully functional WATCH BUILDER, available at this link:

We are a pair of engineering students with a shared passion: elegant, stylish and minimal wristwatches. After becoming frustrated with what is available on the market within the constraints of quality, design, personalization and affordability, we set out to build the perfect watch which raises the bar in these four fields.

We pursued a design inspired by a theme and a meaning - essentially having a character yet being undeniably classic and timeless. This brought a new design language to the watch world. Not only just a new look, but one drawn from history.

The history of the wrist watch dates back to 1810, however its popularity was solely among women. It only became popular among men during the Anglo Boer war due to its convenience. This era also marks the birth of the propeller aircraft. In World War One both the propeller aircraft and the wrist watch were officially issued to aid and implement new strategies.

The wrist watch used alongside aircraft in their early beginnings created the theme and character inspiration used to design our watches. Using premium materials, the watches succeed in defining elegance in simplicity drawn from the design of the trench watches and early propeller aircraft.

We aim to offer timepieces that are luxurious, affordable and customizable in a way that any individual can add their own unique touch of personality. Help us raise funds for our first few production runs. With additional pledges beyond our goal, we aim to create a much larger and more diverse range of straps (including adding color schemes and new materials) and a new watch model before the end of the year.

One watch may not suit all outfits. Buying multiple watches may prove to be unaffordable. We provide a solution by offering an extensive and diverse variety of fully interchangeable straps, allowing you to switch your look with ease, in no time at all. Having one watch with the three different types of band we offer gives you three unique styles – a more classic look with Italian leather, stainless-steel mesh for high-class and nylon for the casual summer style.

Passion doesn’t stop at beauty. We have a profound passion for quality. Using superior quartz movements made by the Seiko Epson Corporation, 316L Stainless Steel, fine Italian leather, premium mesh and scratch-proof sapphire crystal glass demands a high end price tag from competitors - we offer all of these at a price that people can afford, and thus a watch you can wear on your wrist daily, rather than remaining behind a display.

We are so confident in the quality of our timepieces and premium materials, that we back each unit with a two year warranty. Should anything happen within the first two years, please send it back to us and we will replace it with a new one*. We promise great customer service, so you can always be assured to have any issue handled quickly and efficiently.
*Warranty does not cover accidental damage, battery life or wear and tear.",48.0,1,"1 Campaign
surrounded with mass produced, molded plastic products – all identical and often cheap. A stereotype of plastic as a low value, individuality lacking material is strong.

With years of engineering and designing on the edge of art and technology, we discovered a completely new processes - plastic is shaped in the hands of the artist literally in the air. As a result a familiar material takes new staggering forms, deep and rich textures of jewelry with truly luxurious and smart touch. The possibilities, processes and final result are fascinating.
