column2: Spacemen Cover"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""http://s14.postimage.org/cf57d6ey9/igg_cover_lrg.png"" src="""" style=""vertical-align: middle

column1: Confederation Patch! All people who contributed at the Sub-Lieutenant level or higher will receive a Confederation sew-on patch. The patch will be about 3"" x 3"" and also feature a convenient iron-on backing.
Carry Out Missions in the Final Frontier!

column2: Spacemen was first released back in 1978, and only the second science fiction RPG in development in the early 70s.

column1: This second edition of the classic game is compatible with Labyrinth Lord and Mutant Future. The best elements of the first edition have been kept--the classes and subclasses, the excellent starship rules, and the space adventuring rules. Classes, races, and abilities have been made more in line with Labyrinth Lord.
This second edition has elements that let you customize the style of play whether you prefer an ""original series"" feel, a ""next generation"" feel, or something in between.
You won't be bogged down by an over-complicated and detailed galaxy. That's one of the difficulties sometimes when trying to play in an established licensed universe. With Starships &
column2: Spacemen get just enough information to get going, and plenty of advice for designing your galaxy. Galactic space will be yours to customize.

column1: Much like in Labyrinth Lord, in Starships &amp
column2: Spacemen you design your milieu. This is adventuring in space, not History 101!

column1: There are different funding levels to accommodate different interests. In addition to the Starships &
column2: Spacemen book, we have purchased the rights to the Bridge Crew line of miniatures, which are available at certain funding levels for those interested. (See below for photos.)

column1: Pledging at any level gets you access to the playtest draft and the playtest forums at www.goblinoidgames.com/forums
Once you've pledged, please register an account at the forums and send me an email to give you access to the forum.

Unlike some other projects that will happen anyway, this project will not happen unless we reach our goal. At least, not anytime soon. Your preorder helps us pay for the rest of the art, production costs (for both the book and the miniatures), and all other expenses (like shipping costs).
However, the book is already written and is currently in playtest.

Goblinoid Games has been in business since 2006, specializing in old-school games. We have a strong track record of delivering what we promise. Several months ago we successfully crowd-funded and delivered the Labyrinth Lord Referee Screen.
The Bridge Crew miniatures are available to everyone at the Commander level and above. (The miniatures you get will not be painted or assembled as applicable.)
These figures are available at the Captain level of support. (The miniatures you get will not be painted or assembled as applicable.)

Confederation Patch! All people who contributed at the Sub-Lieutenant level or higher will receive a Confederation sew-on patch. The patch will be about 3"" x 3"" and also feature a convenient iron-on backing.
Carry Out Missions in the Final Frontier!
Starships & Spacemen was first released back in 1978, and only the second science fiction RPG in development in the early 70s.

This second edition of the classic game is compatible with Labyrinth Lord and Mutant Future. The best elements of the first edition have been kept--the classes and subclasses, the excellent starship rules, and the space adventuring rules. Classes, races, and abilities have been made more in line with Labyrinth Lord.
This second edition has elements that let you customize the style of play whether you prefer an ""original series"" feel, a ""next generation"" feel, or something in between.

You won't be bogged down by an over-complicated and detailed galaxy. That's one of the difficulties sometimes when trying to play in an established licensed universe. With Starships & Spacemen get just enough information to get going, and plenty of advice for designing your galaxy. Galactic space will be yours to customize.
Much like in Labyrinth Lord, in Starships & Spacemen you design your milieu. This is adventuring in space, not History 101!

There are different funding levels to accommodate different interests. In addition to the Starships & Spacemen book, we have purchased the rights to the Bridge Crew line of miniatures, which are available at certain funding levels for those interested. (See below for photos.)
Pledging at any level gets you access to the playtest draft and the playtest forums at www.goblinoidgames.com/forums
Once you've pledged, please register an account at the forums and send me an email to give you access to the forum.

Unlike some other projects that will happen anyway, this project will not happen unless we reach our goal. At least, not anytime soon. Your preorder helps us pay for the rest of the art, production costs (for both the book and the miniatures), and all other expenses (like shipping costs).
However, the book is already written and is currently in playtest.

Goblinoid Games has been in business since 2006, specializing in old-school games. We have a strong track record of delivering what we promise. Several months ago we successfully crowd-funded and delivered the Labyrinth Lord Referee Screen.
The Bridge Crew miniatures are available to everyone at the Commander level and above. (The miniatures you get will not be painted or assembled as applicable.)
These figures are available at the Captain level of support. (The miniatures you get will not be painted or assembled as applicable.)",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

★★★The Easy Life Belt is made of very durable military cotton webbing, minimal shaped metal buckle, stylish leather label, secret strong magnet which allows the end of the belt is not swinging and finally for this belt specially developed durable elastic which is main part of this product. This part in front of the belt is flexible at exactly determined area which means that it is gently stretched at each body move (e.g. at seating, folding, sheltering, …). That’s why the belt is breathing together with you and your body in all your activities!

Making Sure you are NOT wearing a belt while doing this, put a measuring tape through your pant/skirt loops and wrap it around your waist. Because you don’t want your new belt to interfere with your breath, inhale deeply and then measure your girth. Where the tape end meets the rest of the band, you will read your bodily circumference. That will be the size you need to provide when ordering your new belt.
Behind the name GIPSY AND CLOWN stands I Jaka, one of the last qualified tailors in Europe and my girl Janja.
Janja is fashion designer and she just adores sewing and designing of the clothes.
I started my education in early age and i earned my first snowboard and motocross bike when i was only seven years old in a home workshop, where i energetically drew knowledge.
We are very well educated textile designers, lovers of extreme sports, nature and animals. In free time we also love to paint and create music.

Our first campaign was great school and we learned a lot! Easy Life Belt was choosen to be one of this year ISPO MUNICH finnalists!! And also that give us a power and strength to create even better, more stylish and  more useful - Easy Life Belt MAGNETIC!! For all of you!! And this time also for your children!!
Hidden strong magnet prevents the end of the belt from swinging and you can also attach it to any metal!

Idea about Easy Life Belt was born when i had enough feeling that classic belt limited me in my work and sport activities. Than we found out that people sit more and more each day - some of us even 14 hours a day. Based on this finding we immediately started to work. After a number of trials we created unique Gipsy and Clown belt – Easy Life Belt MAGNETIC!

This belt is the only belt in the world, which has inserted the elastic part. The elastic part is located at the front of the belt, because in that part of the body the physical workload is the biggest.
I found manufacturer of high quality military cotton webbing and experts who helped me to develop unique durable elastic part of the belt (which was developed for this belt only).

I and my friends tested this belt for more than one year. They were all impressed about it and they would not replace it any more for the ordinary belt. When the belt received first positive feedback and fans, it was time for a design. The belt is designed with a lot of sense and love for street wear.
EASY LIFE BELT MAGNETIC breathes with the user. The belt has positive effect on a daily life, user´s feelings and emotions. You can use it during work, sport or any other free activity you like!
<ul><li><b> SUPPORT us and become a part of our STORY!
You will get the first belt that breathes with you! Try Easy Life Belt MAGNETIC and you'll see. You'll never replace it anymore. Breathe with us!

10 inch wide surface beach wheels are wider and rounder to maximize surface contact allowing you to roll your EROVR with ease in both sand and snow.
The two retractable side arms are perfect for hauling extra cargo like umbrellas and folding chairs.
Transform Your EROVR into a Mobile Bike Trailer!
Connect your EROVR to your bike with our custom extension arm and 16 inch rear wheels.
column2: >Perfect for picnics in the park, beach days, or a quick trip to the grocery store, the EROVR Trailer Hitch Kit allows you to easily haul all the gear and supplies you need for your next adventure.

column1: Fishing Trips Without All of the Trips to the Car...

Give your arms a rest and let EROVR carry your tackle box, cooler, fishing rods, nets, buckets, chairs, and towels. Attach the Fishing Rod Holders to the EROVR side panels to keep your rods upright and secure.
With your phone fully charged and your favorite music playing, your adventure is sure to last all day!

The portable Bluetooth Speaker and USB Power Bank is a great companion for the beach, park or any outdoor adventure. Conveniently store them inside one of the compartments in the main top cover of the EROVR.
• Two USB 1A and 2.1A Power Outputs (Charge two devices at once!)
• Built-in security protection design for short-circuit and over-current protection
• High frequency response with distortion free at max volume.

This portable organizer makes transporting arts, crafts, books and binders easy! The Hobby Canvas Liner is easy to detach from the EROVR and load into your vehicle. The
assembled dimensions of 18 inches wide by 18 inches long by 13 inches tall make
it the ideal size for smaller projects and activities.

Dimensions: 
1. Storage position (closed): 23"" Wide x 21"" Tall x 7"" Thick
2. Flat cart position (Fully open): 18"" Wide x 36"" Long with 34"" foldable sides

Frame:
18"" wide Aluminum chassis with a center hinge.

Wheels:
Rear Wheels:  7"" x 2"" Premium Wheel has a lightweight, reinforced nylon core with a high strength non-marking elastomeric rubber tread. 
Front Wheels:  5"" x 3/4"" Double cater wheels

What does EROVR mean?
The name EROVR came from NASA’s creation of the Mars Rover. The Mars Rover was created to explore the surface of Mars, the EROVR (Earth ROVR) was created to assist you in life adventures.

What makes EROVR different?
EROVR is first of its kind, simple and adaptable. EROVR is a multi-functional personal carrier that transforms into various operational modes, simply by adjusting its configurations to suit the task at hand.

What is the actual weight of the EROVR?
EROVR is currently estimated at 25 pounds.

Whats the load capacity?
EROVR’s load capacity is 250 pounds.

Is the EROVR easy to change into its different positions?
Yes it is! There is a simple pull/release button for every operational setting. The EROVR will come with a simple guide illustrating its operation from one position to the other.

Do I need tools to interchange the different accessories tires?
No, the EROVR’s quick release push button will easily assist in changing the tires. 

What kind of assembly is required for EROVR?
There is no assembly required. The moment you receive your EROVR it will be ready to use.

Where will you ship?
We plan on shipping worldwide! However, please note: every country has its own shipping regulations and rules. Please perk pricing for details.

How much is shipping and handling?
United States: $20
Canada: $55
Rest of World: $80

Can I add a perk (and pay for multiple perks at once)? 
It's exciting to hear that you've found multiple perks you are interested in getting!

Please note, at this time, Indiegogo does not have a feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

Can I change or cancel my perk?
Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk
Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.

Will EROVR have a warranty?
Yes, we will provide a one (1) year limited warranty. 

How can I get in touch with your team?
You can connect with us anytime at connect@erovr.com

There is a simple pull/release button for every operational setting. The EROVR will come with a simple guide illustrating its operation from one position to the other.Do I need tools to interchange the different accessories tires?No, the EROVR’s quick release push button will easily assist in changing the tires. What kind of assembly is required for EROVR?There is no assembly required. The moment you receive your EROVR it will be ready to use.Where will you ship?We plan on shipping worldwide! However, please note: every country has its own shipping regulations and rules. Please perk pricing for details.How much is shipping and handling?United States: $20Canada: $55Rest of World: $80
Can I add a perk (and pay for multiple perks at once)? It's exciting to hear that you've found multiple perks you are interested in getting!

Please note, at this time, Indiegogo does not have a feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

Can I change or cancel my perk?Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk
Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.
Will EROVR have a warranty?Yes, we will provide a one (1) year limited warranty. How can I get in touch with your team?You can connect with us anytime at connect@erovr.com",28.0,0,"1 Campaign

column7: >Comments from backers on Kickstarter for Twain Wallet

column1: Twain wallet is the essential every-day carry minimalist wallet you were looking for that can hold not just cards and cash but also coins, keys and usb flash drives. Twain wallet holds all those securely at the same time being extremely compact

Regular elastic wallets do an amazing job in keeping your cards compact but most of the time it is very difficult to pull out the card you need. With our innovative pull-tab design in Twain wallet the task is a breeze. Even when the pull-tab is fully drawn the cards are held securely at place as can be seen from project video.

You can mix and match the colours (Black, Brown and Tan) to select the one you desire. In total 9 cool options to choose from. In addition you can also select Blue or Red wallet (no mix and match). Thread colour is Cream.

We are proud to be part of the community of designers who are helping people to get rid of unnecessary things they carry around on them everyday. With Twain, we are confident that we have created a wallet that is not just minimalist but very convenient to use. Twain also allows you to carry occasional extras such as coins, keys etc.
column52:
all at the same time being extremely compact.

Designing and making prototypes are just a small part of the goal. Now we need your support to put Twain into production. If you like the concept of Twain please back us to help secure the minimum order required for a production run. Also please help us spread the word in social media.

column91:
/>

With Love and Gratitude

Artitude

Risks and challenges

Our prototypes are entirely hand crafted at our studio (practically my living room converted to workshop) which we call ART.ST. 
Once the project is successful our plan is to make the final wallets here itself. But if the support is overwhelming we have our very trusted professional manufacturer, who had successfully provided their excellent services for our last two projects, lined up for production. We will update our backers regularly on the progress of the production until the last wallet have been dispatched from our studio.

FAQs
column94:
>Q: How many cards can I fit inside a Twain Wallet?

A: Though it can hold more occasionally, we recommend six to seven cards on a regular basis.

Q: When do we choose our colours?

A: We will send you an email to your Indiegogo email with instructions on how to pick the colour of your Twain Wallet once we complete the project successfully.
column97:
>Q: Do you cover import fees as well as shipping costs?

A: We only cover the shipping costs. Import fees and other customs duty are not covered by us. We send the wallets via regular Royalmail post and so far backers have received them without any issues.

column1: I felt pressure from family and friends to exceed expectations
when it came to pursuing a career. My mother implored me to seek routine and
stability while my father pushed me to aim for wherever higher education could
lead. Instead I chose to pursue happiness - whatever that meant for me. On my
journey I was able to launch a successful eBay handbag company through
partnerships with street vendors, work in high-end retail stores and even
become the face for a few beauty and fashion lines as a model. I finally found
my calling when I had the opportunity to work with a well-established jewelry
designer. I was able to have hands on involvement with a growing company. I
used this time to groom my design aesthetic and to soak up knowledge on running
a succesful business. My most important lesson was that you cannot do it alone. I have
realized that my happiness comes from the pursuit of my best self. I am
Veronika and with your help I am commited to creating a life Unrivaled.

why wear Veronika?

At the core of my brand is
a desire to build a world that reflects my perspective. I am most fulfilled when I am able to bring a piece from conception to tangible form. I challenge myself to
share my life experiences, belief system, fashion sense and whimsical thoughts
with each piece of jewelry. Every
piece is designed and assembled by me and an intimate team. They are each customizable with the ability to reflect the individual owner. Because my material
(fur) cannot be duplicated, like you, each piece is one of a kind.

Sammy's Dream!

Please take a few minutes to read about my long standing Dream! Hi, I am Samantha Mincey and I have a Dream! My family has always been a caring giving family. Dad and Mom have been married for 25 years and raised three beautiful children, who one day in 2006 discovered motorsports. As a family, for years, we worked as race track volunteers. With my Dad's racing success we can give back to Testicular Cancer Foundation (TCF) at the race events! Thanks to all our club racing friends at Sports Car Club of America (SCCA), National Sports Car Association (NASA), and Formula Automobile Racing Association (FARA). Immediately our family knew we loved racing and volunteering was where our family was happy!

 While volunteering with my family, one day at a local track, I asked my Dad,"" can you be a pro-race car driver someday?"" He smiled at me and said"" Yes I can be a pro-race car driver"" That day... started Samantha's Dream! My Dad, is now ever so close to making my long standing Dream a reality, as well as his dream of using his pro racing status to educate, support, raise contributions, and save young males lives with Testicular Cancer Foundation (TCF). He has entered his first Professional SCCA Pirelli World Challenge Race for the 2015 season in Texas.

You can join my Dream and be an important part of what I've wished for since 2006. This campaign is so vital to of giving back to my Dad, in huge way! With help from my Dad, working closely with me on my homework and singing lessons, I am a straight A student in school and a very good singer too! My Dad always gives me his attention and help! I love my Dad! He actually cares more about others than being a Pro Driver himself. His idea to put TCF Cancer Foundation logo on his race car and raise money for those who are so desperate in need of self exam education! I am very proud of my Dad! Please support SAMMY'S DREAM!

 In March, 2015 the Pirelli World Challenge road racing series will race in Texas on CBS Sports Network in front of 5.5 million worldwide fans. Also the 100,000 fans at the events are potential TCF charity donors. Please help us meet our goal, so we can make my Dream come true. All the money raised will go to my Dad's grassroots TCF Cancer Charity logo's and advertising. What a Dream it would be for me to see my Dad race across the United States, on CBS Sports, in front of millions while raising money for Testicular Cancer Foundation! Wow! I am so excited! Thank You to those who care!

 My Dad has been very successful in amateur racing. With thirteen combined car racing Championships, since 2006, it not been easy financially for my family to be successful, but my Dad keeps winning! I am proud of my Dad! I know my Dad will be successful at the Pirelli Pro Racing level of racing! Be a part of my Dream!

 With your contributions to my Dream, and for your generosity, you will receive from me... awesome Samantha's Dream Team gear, and get an opportunity to drive a fully built race car, coached by a my awesome Dad, and/or fulfill your fantasy of being a Dream Team owner for a weekend.  If you like our campaign but cannot contribute to Samantha's Dream, that's ok, you can still help by sharing this campaign to other's who will help my Dad reach our goal of racing while raising money for TCF Cancer Charity! What were your dreams growing up? Please contribute to SAMMY'S DREAM, to ensure the TCF Race team is successful in our crowd funding efforts!

AS SEEN ON ...

 

AND SUPPORTED BY ...

 

OUR STORY

Hi, I’m Will, founder of Vitae London.

My passion for social business was inspired by my father. He grew up in a remote rural village in Ghana and was the first in his family line to learn to read and write. Now, a generation later, I am lucky enough to live in one of the greatest cities in the world, London.

Following a trip to South Africa my wife and I saw first-hand the challenges that some children face in getting access to education. Food and clothing is important, but without education there is little chance of these children breaking out of the cycle of poverty that they find themselves trapped in.

One child we met had witnessed his father get stabbed to death in front of him. His mother couldn’t afford a school uniform or other resources, denting his confidence and leading to truancy.

That all changed with a new school uniform. He found the confidence he needed to attend school and is now well on his way towards gaining an education.

From the profit on every watch sold, we provide two sets of school uniform to children caught in poverty in South Africa, with the aim of expanding across more of the continent. Last year alone, Vitae supplied over 1,000 school uniforms.

Our dream for this year is to help build schools and improve the lives of more children than ever before. That's where you come in.

By pre-ordering a classic Vitae watch, you're investing in lasting style and making a real social impact.

 

VITAE WATCHES

Vitae London is a watch brand that designs elegant watches at affordable prices.

Design - Born of London

Our classic watch designs are heavily influenced by London’s rich heritage, style and culture. This amazing city exudes class and sophistication, and that’s what our watches represent.

I love London. The amazing mix of people. The open and accepting culture. The rich and varied history. The blend of the classic and contemporary. Even the architecture is inspiring.

I wanted to incorporate all of these elements into simple, clean, elegant designs. Watches born not just in London, but of London - capturing that classic London feel.

It was also important to us that our design stay true to the classic, minimalist look so that they can be worn by anyone in any situation. Whether attending a film premier in Leicester Square or running the London Marathon - Vitae watches are elegant yet durable.

 

The Face

A sleek, round, contemporary face design with minimalist features to avoid clutter.

A watch face is arguably the most important aspect of the design. Vitae watches take a minimalist approach to our watch face design, stripping back the clutter to give an elegant, refined feel.

The round face with sloping lugs brings symmetry to the design, forming the watch around the shape of your wrist.

Dials and hands are colour-matched with your choice of metal for an effortlessly bold look, while a soft bevel on the sleek, pointed hands captures the light for a distinguished finish.

A small date window has been intricately crafted into one side of the watch face to provide added functionality while maintaining the minimalist style.

Finally, the Vitae logo - our guarantee of quality - is discretely placed in the 12 o’clock position to preserve the symmetrical balance of the design.

 

The Strap

Our finely-knit, stainless steel Milanese straps give our classic watches a contemporary finish.

 

Artisans of Milan - once famous for their fine chain-mail armour - now turn their hands to create these fine-knit metal watch bracelets. Small chains are meticulously stitched together to form a fine mesh of stainless steel, at once providing style and durability.

Milanese bracelets allow us to add a contemporary twist to our otherwise classic style watch designs.

“It’s all about bringing worlds together - classic design with contemporary features, poverty in South Africa with London glamour. The Milanese strap allows us to merge classic design with modern flare.” - Will Adoasi

 

Bringing it all together

All our watches use the highest-quality components, encased in a water-resistant, stainless steel case. Classic, bold features punctuate the smooth lines of the watch face, while leather or stainless steel straps deliver comfort and support.

It’s also very important to us how our watches are made. The last thing we wanted to do while supporting children through education in South Africa was have children producing the watches in unsafe conditions. We selected factories with the very highest ethical standards, checked by independent auditors, to produce and assemble all our watches.

 

CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS

""What Vitae London is doing is great, very simple but effective""  -  Sir Richard Branson

Pre-order your Vitae watch now and make a real social impact. Select your reward package from the options on the right.

 

REWARDS

Free 2 Year International Warranty on all Vitae watches.

New perk available:

Engrave your Vitae Midnight Walmer Watch for just £29. If you have already bought one of our watches during this campaign, jut choose the 'engrave your watch' perk to upgrade, otherwise to buy the watch with the engraving choose the 'Early Bird +engraving' option. We can engrave up to 10 characters onto your watch and will contact you for the text once the campaign is over.

Here is an example of the engraving:

 

 

ABOUT VITAE

 

VITAE TEAM

","AS SEEN ON ... AND SUPPORTED BY ... OUR STORYHi, I’m Will, founder of Vitae London.My passion for social business was inspired by my father. He grew up in a remote rural village in Ghana and was the first in his family line to learn to read and write. Now, a generation later, I am lucky enough to live in one of the greatest cities in the world, London.Following a trip to South Africa my wife and I saw first-hand the challenges that some children face in getting access to education. Food and clothing is important, but without education there is little chance of these children breaking out of the cycle of poverty that they find themselves trapped in.One child we met had witnessed his father get stabbed to death in front of him. His mother couldn’t afford a school uniform or other resources, denting his confidence and leading to truancy.That all changed with a new school uniform. He found the confidence he needed to attend school and is now well on his way towards gaining an education.From the profit on every watch sold, we provide two sets of school uniform to children caught in poverty in South Africa, with the aim of expanding across more of the continent. Last year alone, Vitae supplied over 1,000 school uniforms.Our dream for this year is to help build schools and improve the lives of more children than ever before. Risks and challenges

Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill on time. We've added some buffer into our lead time to account for this possibility. Regardless, we will be extremely hands on with our suppliers to ensure that everything is moving forward smoothly.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, Singapore, Hong Kong and Australia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

column1:
Q: Can it hold cash?

A: Yes, but you'll have to fold the bills.

Q: How many cards can I fit inside it?

A: You can fit quite a few more than you'd think.

We recommend a maximum of eleven cards and a little cash.

Q: How much will shipping cost?

A: We're pleased to offer free worldwide shipping, always.

","The wallet in your pocket was made to keep your money portable and more importantly safe.
It does precisely that with it's built in RFID Protection.
It provides elegance and security without compromising its minimal design.
It is the thinnest & most minimal Wallet available.
It'll fit into any pocket unnoticed.
It takes up to 11+ cards and a few folded bills..
.. and ages beautifully as it grows old.
The thin and secure design makes for an amazingly discreet front pocket wallet.
It's a true minimalists pocket companion, it saves time and hassle by removing all that clutter in your wallet.
Contactless cards from around the globe are prone to RFID skimming, allowing thieves to take your money and details without detection.
Worldwide more than 40% of people own a contactless card. It doesn't let that happen. With its built-in RFID protection, it seamlessly protects and secures your contactless cards.
Every single part of it is crafted to perfection, from the bespoke Italian leather to the fine stitching which holds it all together.
We infused the premium qualities of Italian leather into our original wallet design.
The finest leather, stitched to perfection in a Tuscan Red Wallet.
It comes in three awesome colours.
Tuscan Red -  Cocoa Brown - Asphalt Black
It is now ready to send!
The Wallet is wrapped in a simplistic yet robust package.
Vincoe was derived from a collective obsession to make products simple and elegant.
We're two students who like to keep things simple and love to share our passion for simplicity. We wanted a wallet for minimalists like ourselves, who want security with no compromise.

column6: >Scientific breakthroughs have made the TheraCopper possible
column8:
>

What is back pain?
The most common forms of physical pain are caused by tissue damage from injury, stress or decay, causing nerves fibers to signal the brain with a pain sensation. Nerve fibers send signal to the brain.

Back pain can have causes that aren't due to underlying disease. Examples include overuse such as working out or lifting too much, prolonged sitting and lying down, sleeping in an uncomfortable position, or wearing a poorly fitting backpack.

A muscle strain, or pulled muscle, occurs when your muscle is overstretched or torn. This usually occurs as a result of fatigue, overuse, or improper use of a muscle. Strains can happen in any muscle, but they're most common in your lower back, neck, shoulder, and hamstring, which is the muscle behind your thigh.
column9: >Say goodbye to chronic pain
column12:
>Essential For Pain-Free Living

 

ALL-IN-ONE SOLUTION FOR BACK STRAIN AND PAIN

Gone are the days when you had to buy one brace for upper back, one for mid back and one for lumbar area. TheraCopper Back Brace is FDA Approved and our upgraded 2nd Generation device provides instant and affordable back pain relief.

Zero negative side effects have been reported

column1:
Relieves Pressure On Sensitive Nerves

All-day long, the back muscles and lumbar vertebrae must hold up the head. When combined with the twisting and bending of daily activities, it creates lots of pressure on the nerves, especially if the vertebrae are out of alignment.



 

The pain can be debilitating and intense.
Removing the pressure from the nerve is the only way to stop the excruciating pain. The TheraCopper Back Brace gently decompresses the spine. You’ll feel immediate relief as the nerves stop being pinched by the bones and muscles in your back.
column2:
>Revolutionary method to reduce pain:
Fix the source of pain, not just the sensation
column3:
>What if you could manage your back pain safely and naturally, with no doctor's visits, no painkillers, no surgery

 

Relieves Back Strains And Pain 

People with spinal conditions will benefit from using TheraCopper Back Brace because the traction reverses the force of gravity. The lumbar/thoracic back brace also compresses your abdomen, which reduces pressure on the spine. This, in turn, eases your pain and helps the spine. The mechanical pulley system makes it easy for you to generate a lot of compression with very little effort or twisting. The corset system multiplies your force by five.

 

The full-body back brace limits your ability to hunch the back, twist the torso or bend side to side. Besides improving your posture, controlling your back’s motion can also prevent an existing injury from worsening, slow degeneration and help your back heal. 

 

Stabilizes And Straightens The Spine

The corrective brace stabilizes the back from the top of the sacrum (S1 vertebra) just above the tailbone through the lumbar (lower) spine to the top of the thoracic spine (T2 vertebrae) just below the neck.

 

More TheraCopper Benefits

column1: • Helps treat degenerative disc disease, spinal stenosis, sciatica and spondylolysis

• Treatment for bulging and herniated discs. Helps eliminate lower back and radiating pain in the hips, thighs, legs and/or feet.  Bulging and herniated discs are reduced by elongating the intervertebral space in the lumbar spine
• Assists individuals with strenuous jobs requiring heavy lifting or long hours of driving
• Helps maintain proper posture. Improper posture places the upper body weight directly on the discs and causes back pain

column2:
> 

 

1. Three level detachable back support brace, to provide more support to the back.

It is designed according to the physiological spinal curvature. Adjust the support strength according to your own needs or even remove it.
column3:
>

 

2. Two detachable magic waist support pads which can  provide more support to our waist.

Adjust the position according to your waist and no need worry about body type.
column4: >The New Heated Therapy Back Brace that can dramatically level-up your recovery within minutes!
column5:
>

 

3. The Big back support plate, increases the support area, making the spine more comfortable.

 

4. Customizable slide rail pulley system

Reduces the frictional force between the big back plate and the belt which can provide the  smooth lifting experience.
column6:
>Our 2nd Generation TheraCopper back support belt uses our unique technical designs.

 

Made To Last

Experience the joys of owning a Traction-At-Home device that can withstand anything and everything that both you and nature will throw at it. The TheraCopper Back is exactly that kind of device. Made from the combination of medical grade ABS, industrial strength nylon and PP, the TheraCopper Back has been crafted using latest technology. It will last a lifetime.

 

Very Simple To Adjust And Control 

Unlike with other device which don't have enough traction power or lack of controlled traction, with TheraCopper Back Device - you're in control all the time. As soon as you activate the traction mechanism, you can adjust it to your liking. Without ever over-doing it. 

 

Versatile

While TheraCopper Back provides instant decompression and traction, it can be used as a back support as well. If you recently underwent a surgery or had your back injured, TheraCopper Back can serve as solid support until your back finally heals.

column2: >""What starts in your heart,
column3: >will in turn change your world.""
column4:
>...and this is how. 

 

Hi. I am Derek. I am the chief designer and founder of Mirabilio. 

I set out with a curiosity. A curiosity about our own ""human"" experience. With a fascination for how we express our identity and how our mood influences the way we perceive life. As a mountain biker, I’ve always felt the presence of nature as I ride through the woods. I feel joyful and free. This mindset in combination with being in nature led me to see how closely connected we are to the natural-world. I then began to integrate elements found in nature with style, as an expression of personal identity.

In creating the Mirabilio brand, I held a goal… a vision… an ideal in my mind. That I want to change the way people look and feel about themselves. I believe one can achieve lasting change through introspection, positive affirmations, self-awareness, gratitude, abundance, and faith.

My designs are grounded in the belief that, “our thoughts create our reality.” Knowing what we wear portrays an image that influences our thoughts and perspectives about ourselves. As a designer my purpose is to use my gift to help others design a positive change in the way they see themselves.

What evolved is a brand distinctly unique for the introspective soul seeking to express a personal identity, that is spiritually powerful and physically grounded. Mirabilio is a collection of one-of-a-kind natural elements &
column5:
individually hand-burned wooden accents, that connect you with the outdoors. The entire brand is centered around a deeper connection to ‘self…’ and the connections we have to the natural world.

 

PROJECTS

The Mirabilio collection comes together through 3 Projects:
column7: >First the I AM PROJECT, which is the heart and soul of the Mirabilio brand.
column8: >This Project helps you to take your mind to quieter, calmer levels of thinking. Every element focuses your thoughts and centers your awareness. It is meant to guide you toward mental clarity and stillness. When you are seeking support, love, or protection, the I AM PROJECT may be a great fit for how you express the true power of your inner-self.
column10: >The second, is the ATMAN PROJECT, which is a collection of concept and limited edition designs.
column11: >So named for its uniqueness as Atman is the spiritual life principle of the universe. In essence, it is your soul.
column13:
>Finally, the ABUNDANCE PROJECT is our way of giving to the community. This is how Mirabilio supports impactful social projects. 

 

 

And so… here is where we’re at…

The full product line is operational. The website, social media, distribution systems… are all set up. We’re already selling direct to you (the individual) and boutiques.

Here’s where you come in. Mirabilio has been asked to be a vendor at one of the largest fashion trade-shows in NYC, called FAME!   WE ARE IN!    September 1, 2020 is the Show!

This is happening and I couldn’t be more excited!

Life is Good! Like Paulo Coelho famously wrote — “And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.”

Here is what I’m asking the Universe to provide, in order to make this trade show a success!

column2: Raw Goods — quantities sufficient for increasing inventory

column1: Machines — tools necessary to scale from small- to mid-sized production
Presentation — branded boxes, flyers, brochures, look-books, hang-tags, earring cards, business cards, and shipping supplies

column2:
>WHAT YOU’LL GET

An opportunity to join the Mirabilio Tribe, from the ground floor. Be a part of a community that offers a positive message in the world with a personal identity created by love, strength and purpose for others. You can back this campaign with as little as $10, so you can show your support at any level. If you want to give a little more, then this is your opportunity to get your own Mirabilio design at a discounted price. 

 

Go ahead and click the pledge button to back Mirabilio all the way to NYC.

 

Remember... No matter how much you give... if you really want to show your love, share this campaign with your social media.

 

See you in New York!

>$15,000 -- I will be able to purchase (in bulk) custom boxes, flyers, brochures, look-books, hang-tags, earring cards, business cards, and shipping supplies. This is for each and every piece throughout the entire supply-chain. Additionally, it secures enough quantities for Mirabilio to reliably deliver a higher caliber finished product for current and forecasted demand from this trade show
column4: >$25,000 -- In addition to everything mentioned, I will bulk order more raw materials and purchase better tools, which will immediately expand my production capacities while reducing the manufacturing lead-time for product delivery to the market. In addition, this will drive innovation and new designs. Most importantly, this will allow Mirabilio to donate more to charitable organizations through ABUNDANCE PROJECT. Thus will in turn strengthen the significance of the jewelry you’re already wearing.
column5: >$75,000 -- “Create the vision in my heart and change my world forever.” It will allow me to purchase even more machines that produce better and faster products, with greater efficiencies. In turn, this will bring the Mirabilio brand to a series of trade shows across the country in 2021.
column7:
>

","""What starts in your heart, will in turn change your world."" ...and this is how.  Hi. I am Derek. I am the chief designer and founder of Mirabilio. I set out with a curiosity. A curiosity about our own ""human"" experience. With a fascination for how we express our identity and how our mood influences the way we perceive life. As a mountain biker, I’ve always felt the presence of nature as I ride through the woods. I feel joyful and free. This mindset in combination with being in nature led me to see how closely connected we are to the natural-world. I then began to integrate elements found in nature with style, as an expression of personal identity.In creating the Mirabilio brand, I held a goal… a vision… an ideal in my mind. That I want to change the way people look and feel about themselves. I believe one can achieve lasting change through introspection, positive affirmations, self-awareness, gratitude, abundance, and faith.My designs are grounded in the belief that, “our thoughts create our reality.” Knowing what we wear portrays an image that influences our thoughts and perspectives about ourselves. As a designer my purpose is to use my gift to help others design a positive change in the way they see themselves.What evolved is a brand distinctly unique for the introspective soul seeking to express a personal identity, that is spiritually powerful and physically grounded. Mirabilio is a collection of one-of-a-kind natural elements & individually hand-burned wooden accents, that connect you with the outdoors. The entire brand is centered around a deeper connection to ‘self…’ and the connections we have to the natural world. PROJECTSThe Mirabilio collection comes together through 3 Projects:I AM PROJECTFirst the I AM PROJECT, which is the heart and soul of the Mirabilio brand.This Project helps you to take your mind to quieter, calmer levels of thinking. Every element focuses your thoughts and centers your awareness. It is meant to guide you toward mental clarity and stillness. When you are seeking support, love, or protection, the I AM PROJECT may be a great fit for how you express the true power of your inner-self.ATMAN PROJECTThe second, is the ATMAN PROJECT, which is a collection of concept and limited edition designs. So named for its uniqueness as Atman is the spiritual life principle of the universe. In essence, it is your soul.ABUNDANCE PROJECTFinally, the ABUNDANCE PROJECT is our way of giving to the community. This is how Mirabilio supports impactful social projects.   And so… here is where we’re at…The full product line is operational. The website, social media, distribution systems… are all set up. We’re already selling direct to you (the individual) and boutiques.Here’s where you come in. Mirabilio has been asked to be a vendor at one of the largest fashion trade-shows in NYC, called FAME!   WE ARE IN!    September 1, 2020 is the Show!This is happening and I couldn’t be more excited!Life is Good! Like Paulo Coelho famously wrote — “And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.”Here is what I’m asking the Universe to provide, in order to make this trade show a success!

column1: Materials & Raw Goods — quantities sufficient for increasing inventory
Machines — tools necessary to scale from small- to mid-sized production
Presentation — branded boxes, flyers, brochures, look-books, hang-tags, earring cards, business cards, and shipping supplies

WHAT YOU’LL GETAn opportunity to join the Mirabilio Tribe, from the ground floor. Be a part of a community that offers a positive message in the world with a personal identity created by love, strength and purpose for others. You can back this campaign with as little as $10, so you can show your support at any level. If you want to give a little more, then this is your opportunity to get your own Mirabilio design at a discounted price.  Go ahead and click the pledge button to back Mirabilio all the way to NYC. Remember... No matter how much you give... if you really want to show your love, share this campaign with your social media. See you in New York!

With… $15,000 -- I will be able to purchase (in bulk) custom boxes, flyers, brochures, look-books, hang-tags, earring cards, business cards, and shipping supplies. This is for each and every piece throughout the entire supply-chain. Additionally, it secures enough quantities for Mirabilio to reliably deliver a higher caliber finished product for current and forecasted demand from this trade show $25,000 -- In addition to everything mentioned, I will bulk order more raw materials and purchase better tools, which will immediately expand my production capacities while reducing the manufacturing lead-time for product delivery to the market. In addition, this will drive innovation and new designs. Most importantly, this will allow Mirabilio to donate more to charitable organizations through ABUNDANCE PROJECT. Thus will in turn strengthen the significance of the jewelry you’re already wearing. $75,000 -- “Create the vision in my heart and change my world forever.” It will allow me to purchase even more machines that produce better and faster products, with greater efficiencies. In turn, this will bring the Mirabilio brand to a series of trade shows across the country in 2021.",29.0,1,"1 Campaign

With the COVID-19 pandemic reaching historical proportions, how we live our lives has been altered for the foreseeable future. Face masks quickly became part of how we interact with others and live our lives together. They not only protect those wearing them but also those in close proximity.
column2:
>
ProtXair™ Clear and Simple

One of the biggest issues that is easily overlooked is the fit and functionality of a mask. Disposable masks became the go-to solution for most people simply because of price and convenience. By design they do not have a proper seal on your face nor do they offer ideal protection. These masks are also creating an even larger environmental concern. As landfills get contaminated with discarded masks, they are also showing up in creeks, rivers, lakes and oceans. There has to be a better way to protect ourselves.
column3:
>Smart Safe Science Inc. (3S) is a team of Canadian engineers, designers, and manufacturers headquartered in Bracebridge, Ontario, Canada. 3S is partnered with leading Canadian universities and research institutes to bring new and innovative wearable safety products to a global market.

   

In September 2020, we began purchasing equipment and building our new 22,000 sq/ft design and manufacturing facility in Bracebridge, Ontario, Canada. Starting with a clean slate, we were able to build a facility with process capabilities in mind.
column4:
>3S Building Development

Once the epoxy floors were finished, we brought in the largest piece of equipment  which is the core of our manufacturing capabilities.

 

When the shortage of personal protective equipment (PPE) was first identified as a problem here in North America, 3S quickly deployed its design team to develop products to meet this market demand. Behind the scenes, we were able to develop superior products and assemblies quickly with sustainability in mind. Our design, material supply and manufacturing all take place within North America. While other manufacturers and suppliers run into supply and shipping delays, 3S is truly a North American company from fit to finish.

The team at 3S has developed a new face mask in an effort to allow users more comfort, functionality and protection. The ProtXair™ is available as a transparent mask for facial recognition and visual communication. It is also available in a variety of colours, patterns, and custom design. They feature replaceable filters that provide superior protection.

The ProtXair™ has Level 1 PPE certification with Health Canada. The filters are certified with ASTM F2100-1 Level 3 - N95 for North American Markets and EN14683-2013 TypeIIR for European markets.
column6:
Filters

We have built a 22,000 sq/ft manufacturing facility in Bracebridge, Ontario, Canada where  we are manufacturing the ProtXair™ mask, filters and face shields. Unlike other start up companies, we are coming to market process capable and are ready to start shipping masks.
column7: >3S Headquarters, Bracebridge, Ontario, Canada
column10:
>3S Manufacturing, Bracebridge, Ontario, Canada

Over the past months we have focused our engineering efforts on developing a mask with a true seal and no exhaust ports. A mask that is easy to breathe and balanced both in and out.  We have been through many generations of prototypes and now have finished product ready to ship. We need your help supporting domestic PPE manufacturing in North America to start the revolution using masks that do what they are designed to do. Keep us all safe!

 

We have several limited edition masks available for this campaign and look forward to making you safe and comfortable out there in the new world. It's not just science, it's Smart Safe Science!
column11: >Limited Edition Early Bird Models
column22: >The Dark Side
column23: >Transparent with Pink Gasket
column26: >The 3S FiltAir™ Replaceable Filters are recyclable filter packs with 99.98% filtration of 0.3 micron or larger particles.  These filters have some of the highest airflow on of any mask available with over 15 square inches of filtration area in each filter. You decide the frequency of change.  Each filter can last weeks under normal usage and are easily changed in a few seconds.
column29:
>

FiltAir™ Standard
column30:
> FiltAir™ Standard

Available in 10 pieces.  Larger volumes available up on request.

column1: Our vision is promote hemp as a renewable resource through innovative high quality eyewear.
Our story began thanks to a successful Kickstarter campaign back in 2014, raising 150% of our funding goal and over £37,000.
We’ve learned a lot over 2 years. Now we are focusing on premium quality eyewear. To do this, we are raising the funds for new machinery, allowing us to carry out 100% in house manufacture.
We have 5 frame styles to choose from. They are specially designed so that either a sunglass lens OR a prescription lens can be fitted to your frame.
Our frames fit both men and women. For our premium range, we've included adjustable temple tips and nose pads for fine tweaking to your exact fit.

Hemp Eyewear is handmade from organic plant fibre, making our frames one of the most sustainable and innovative on the market. Our new range uses the same unique material as before, with a focus on premium quality:
One of a Kind. Nature has no straight lines. Every frame has its own unique plant fibre pattern in the material, making your pair the only version in existence.

column2: Lighter than Carbon Fibre. Our frames are stronger and lighter than carbon fibre, as well as being made from a natural and renewable material.

column1: Highest quality lenses. Carl Zeiss are industry leaders in lens technology and are used in every frame. Both both sunglasses and optical lenses are available.
Precision Engineered: 5-Barrel Hinges. Our 5-barrel hinges are precision engineered in Germany from specialist high end metal.
Personalised Engraving. Our eyewear is inherently one of a kind. To personalise your frame further, we can engrave your name or chosen text (up to 20 characters) into the inside of the arm.
Special Edition - 100 Frames.  Every engraved pair will be numbered from 01-100 (depending on your 'backer number') along with your name / choice of text.
Handcrafted. Our handcrafted process is completed in our workshop using traditional artisanal techniques to ensure high quality finish and attention to detail.
Temple Tips. Our temple tips are made from bio acetate which are 100% recyclable. Allowing for a precise fit that can be adjusted to suit you and in keeping with our sustainable concept.
High quality eyewear deserves only the best lenses. We use Carl Zeiss, specialists in lens technology, they have a reputation in the industry as producers of the finest lenses.

Sunglass Lenses. 
Our polarised sunglasses offer full 100% UV protection and tinted brown to complement our frames. Zeiss sunglass lenses are high end category 1, ensuring the best quality protection for your eyes.

Optical / Prescription Lenses.  
Extraordinary visual quality, ZEISS optics are thin, lightweight and scratch resistant for perfect vision.
We can fit any prescription lens to our frames and offer the following:
Giving us your prescription. All you need to do is choose the 'Optical' reward. After the campaign ends, we will send you a survey and ask for your prescription, lens type and style of frame.
To show how diverse hemp is, we have created another 2 rewards for our backers, incorporating our solid hemp material in both…

Usually made from unsustainable plastic, our phone cases are eco friendly, unique and handmade from 100% hemp. Everything from the solid exterior, stitching and interior fabric pouch is made from hemp.
Back by popular demand. Our roll top bag is handmade from hemp fabric, hemp thread and incorporates our sustainable material as a feature buckle.

We have gone through the whole crowd funding experience before and have have been running the business successfully over the past couple of years. We know how everything works and the pitfalls of first time project creators etc.

There are no foreseen risks as we already manufacture eyewear in our workshop. The only challenge is waiting for our machinery to be installed and get them up and running. We have a great team of technicians behind us and we're looking forward to our new set up!

THE ULTIMATE PANT FOR TRAVEL, OUTDOORS, AND EVERYTHING IN BETWEEN
When we first imagined the Terrain Pant we began by asking ourselves, If we could take only one pair of pants on a trip around the world, what would they be, and how would they be different?

The Terrain Pant is made with Nano-Wing® twill that performs better than a technical nylon fabric, dries 40% faster than standard material, repels odor and wicks moisture, is self-cleaning, stain and water-resistant, easy-wearing, and built to last.

Since Nano-Wing® fabric repels moisture, your perspiration evaporates through the breathable fabric leaving your clothes smelling fresh even after vigorous activity. And when light hits the fabric it activates anti-microbial CATLIGHT® technology, keeping your pants cleaner for longer without washing.
Inseam: Short 30 inches, Regular 32 inches, Long 36 inches.

The meticulous design and craft that go into making the Terrain Pant great for travel, also make it the perfect pant for every occasion, from the outdoors, to work, to around town. Versatility means everyday, any weather, everywhere.
The fit is tailored and tapered to look sharp around town, but roomie enough to allow you to move freely when on active adventures.
Our Japanese made, Nano-Wing® Technology fabric is Bluesign® Certified
•  Quick-Drying: Dries 40% faster than standard materials
•  Odor Resistant: wicks and evaporates perspiration.
•  Self-Cleaning: When light hits the fabric it activates the anti-microbial CATLIGHT® technology. Keeping your clothes fresh on long journeys and active adventures.
•  UV Protected: the Nano-Wing® fibers are specially cut and spun to capture UV rays, reducing thermal transmission, and keeping you cool while you perform.
•  2-Way Stretch: So your pants move with you.
•  Light weight: Our uniquely woven premium cotton and elastane fibers make for a pant that is half the weight of jeans.

The front button is custom-made in Italy to be more durable than standard acrylic buttons. The double slot design originated by the Canadian military, allows us to attach the button with mil-spec nylon twill.
American made ballistic nylon tab for snapback closure, gives you quick, durable, and secure access to your wallet.
We believe that our pants help our supporters enjoy all our earth has to offer, so it's our responsibility to do what we can to protect it.

We are committed to creating the Terrain Pant with sustainable and ethical practices along the entire supply chain, from no-waste crowdsourcing, to certifiedenvironmentally friendly fabric, to American manufacturing, to compostable packaging.
We craft our pants in America in a family-owned workshop where our skilled sewers are paid on average 200% above California minimum wage.
Our Japanese made, Nano-Wing® Technology fabric is treated with an environmentally friendly C6 Durable Water Repellant finish and is Bluesign certified.

Why Bluesign? The Bluesign® system regulates and reduces environmental impact through the entire textile supply chain from yarn to the finished product. The system reviews the use of chemistry, energy usage, water and air emissions, worker and consumer safety.  Bluesign Technologies encourages the entire textile industry to increase their efforts towards sustainability and reducing their environmental impact across the entire supply chain.

By backing our project you help us line up supply and demand. We don't have inventory piling up in a warehouse and wasteful marketing campaigns to convince you to buy what we already made. We pass that savings back to you. Unlike other brands that cut out the middle-man but keep the savings, you're getting world-class gear at significant savings. We know because our designers used to be in the mainstream apparel industry.

Rivas Supply is led by the brother/sister team of Liam and Ceara McAuliffe. Born and raised in Venice, CA, they have spent the last five years designing and bringing to market over 30 styles combining cutting edge technical materials, Made in America quality, and contemporary style.
We founded Rivas to help define the future of American made apparel.  We believe in making smarter, more sustainable apparel, so you can buy less and enjoy for longer.
Because our Terrain Pant is made with a Durable Water Repellent application, they will absorb less odor and stains, so they can and should be washed less often.
Wash with like colors with mild detergent on cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat. Do not use fabric softener during wash since this can  damage the water repellency. Do NOT bleach. Do NOT dry clean.

We have been in the performance clothing business since 2013, and successfully designed and brought to market over 30 styles. Our team has extensive experience in fabric design and manufacturing high-quality apparel as well as fulfilling lots of orders.
We have our manufacturers lined-up and waiting for our signal. You can be confident that we will deliver what we promise when we say we will.

Over the years we have dealt with our share of obstacles in the manufacturing process, and always handle them in a transparent, responsible way. Our number one goal is to keep our customers not just happy with their products, but also proud to support us. We take all feedback personally, whether its a high-five or a concerned question. We believe our personal connection to our products and our customers is what makes Rivas Supply strong.
Supply Chain Risk: We're proud of our supply chain who we've been working with for the last five years.

We design our products in a studio that's a 15 minute drive from our factory, so we have immediate oversight and quality controls. This gives us confidence that we can make what we say we'll make when we say we'll make it. But sometimes things happen that are simply out of our control, like fabric delays due to yarn being stuck in customs and changing tariff codes. We add time padding for these events, but there's the possibility that it's not enough. If anything should arrive late we will get through it together.
We're excited about delivering a high-quality, sustainably produced product, on time, that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come.
Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us! If you have any questions, please feel free to e-mail us at info@rivassvpply.com

Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us! If you have any questions, please feel free to e-mail us at info@rivassvpply.com",26.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Message from Hudlo

Hudlo Skin to Skin clothing was created by Katie Halverstadt, a Registered Nurse and International Board Certified Lactation Consultant (IBCLC) and designed by her husband Matt. Based
on years of scientific research we know the practice of Skin to Skin Care has a multitude of

column2: keeping babies calm, enhancing brain development, and lowering a

column1:
mothers risk for postpartum depression are just a few. 

The dream at Hudlo is to educate
and empower parents to take ownership of their child’s birth by participating

in Skin to Skin contact directly after delivery. No matter how your baby is born, Skin to Skin Care should be a standard practice for every birth, at home or in the hospital, and especially after a c-section. Our two patent pending products are made from sustainable and earth friendly fabrics. 

These garments are constructed of a French Terry blend of 47.5% organic cotton, 47.5% soy viscose and 5% spandex. Soy fabric is antibacterial, has wicking properties, and is UV resistant. 

Hudlo Skin to Skin clothing is designed and made in Colorado.
column5: >The name Hudlo was born from our two children, Hudson and Harlow, who were both delivered by emergency c-sections. This was the driving factor behind our passion to create true Skin to Skin clothing that is comfortable, fashionable, easy to use, and beneficial to all mothers and all babies.
column9:
>To change the way the world holds our babies through the practice of Skin to Skin Care.


What We Need &
column10:
What You Get

We need $15,000 to get a full scale production run started for the Hudlo Skin to Skin Carrier. Giving moms and babies the ease and opportunity to practice hands free babywearing and breastfeeding on the go. 

Our goal of 15,000 has 2 phases:

column3: >Phase 1 : Start production of the Hudlo Skin to Skin Carrier for babies 6-20 lbs. For use with babies weighing less than 8lbs, seek the advice of a medical professional.

>Phase 2 : Start production  of the Hudlo Skin to Skin OR/NICU Shirt. A shirt to assist with Skin to Skin during a c-section or after delivery for reclined Skin to Skin Care in the recovery room, or NICU. This can also be used after a vaginal delivery.

column1:
price: $5,000

Once we get through our first production we will be working with local agencies to ""Pay it Forward"" and donate a carrier or a shirt to a mom in need.


The Impact
column4:
>

Whether your baby is born of a vaginal or cesarean birth, or if you are an adoptive mom, Skin to Skin Care is easy to incorporate into your daily routine. Immediate Skin to Skin contact is crucial in establishing stable vital signs, good breastfeeding practices, and emotional bonding. Continuous practice of Skin to Skin Care for the following months decreases baby's crying by 45%, enhances emotional brain development, decreases risk of postpartum depression, and helps baby achieve quiet sleep. 


In the US, nearly 1/3 of all births end in a cesarean section. For these moms and babies it is crucial they receive Skin to Skin Care immediately after delivery. Allowing moms to participate in Skin to Skin after a c-section normalizes their birth experience, reduces the risk for postpartum depression, and gives them the immediate chance to hold and bond with their brand new baby. 

Skin to Skin Care has also been shown to increase weight in preterm babies, regulate their temperature, respirations, heartbeat, and encourages them to breastfeed earlier. 

The skin is the largest organ on a human's body and one that is easily taken for granted. The practice of Skin to Skin Care helps to transition a newborn baby from the world they once knew, by imitating the warmth, movement, sound, and nutrition they received in the womb, here on a mom or dad's chest.

Hudlo Carrier size chart                                                                                              S/M 33-36"" bust        M/L 37-39"" bust                          XL 40-42"" bust

Hudlo OR/NICU size chart                                                                                        S/L 33-40"" bust          XL/2XL 40-50"" bust

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:
• Briefly describe your campaign and why it’s important to you.
• Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.
Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?
Break it down for folks in more detail:
• Explain how much funding you need and where it’s going. Be transparent and specific—people need to trust you to want to fund you.
• Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
• Describe where the funds go if you don’t reach your entire goal.
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:
• Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
• Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
• Make it real for people and build trust.
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

This is a story of serendipity. After being a make up artist in the industry for many years, I have used many products that are all wonderful, but are missing healthier ingredients for our skin. One conversation changed my life. Found myself in a lab creating this revolutionary foundation formula.

column1: <h3>Parabens and un-healthy preservatives are in American products. They are known to cause cancer and stay in our bodies forever. Europe has out-lawed parabens in most countries or have strict guidelines. It's time we are progressive and respect what we place on our skin. Also, the time is now to respect our Earth and have recycled packaging and bio-degradable bottles. Let's preserve what we have. Also, 10% of each item sold is given to <a href=""http://www.courageby8.org"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""cursor: pointer
column2: target=""_blank"">www.courageby8.org (an 8 week after school program teaching kids healthier habits.)

column1: We need $1000.00 seed funding to get samples to show investors the product. All together we need $250,000.00 to launch, legal fees and product development. Also, any support, donations, advice and labors of love.

For the Legacy of Thompson Cosmetics and my birthday you can help by donating, spreading the word and reposting this to as many people as possible. All of your good thoughts, encouragement and support are appreciated!

column1: ","This is a story of serendipity. After being a make up artist in the industry for many years, I have used many products that are all wonderful, but are missing healthier ingredients for our skin. One conversation changed my life. Found myself in a lab creating this revolutionary foundation formula.

Parabens and un-healthy preservatives are in American products. They are known to cause cancer and stay in our bodies forever. Europe has out-lawed parabens in most countries or have strict guidelines. It's time we are progressive and respect what we place on our skin. Also, the time is now to respect our Earth and have recycled packaging and bio-degradable bottles. Let's preserve what we have. Also, 10% of each item sold is given to www.courageby8.org (an 8 week after school program teaching kids healthier habits.)

We need $1000.00 seed funding to get samples to show investors the product. All together we need $250,000.00 to launch, legal fees and product development. Also, any support, donations, advice and labors of love.

For the Legacy of Thompson Cosmetics and my birthday you can help by donating, spreading the word and reposting this to as many people as possible. All of your good thoughts, encouragement and support are appreciated!

Have you ever thought about what your legacy would be? Susan Thompson has, and it's a remarkable one -Thompson Cosmetics. It's a makeup line that is not only paraben free, but packaged in bio-degradable bottles.

Her passion for cosmetics began at an early age and lead to a chance encounter during a part-time gig working as a beauty advisor for Shisiedo Cosmetics, she met a formerly battered woman who was reclaiming her life. Thompson gave her a beautiful make over worthy of her new beginning. “I loved making her feel confident with a new face,” Thompson remembers and, she knew in that moment that her profession truly has the power to transform. To the delight of her celebrity clients and star-studded projects, Thompson continues to channel that same prowess her newly formed cosmetics line.  Thompson is now one of the most sought-after rising makeup artists in the industry. Thompson’s career encapsulates high-profile events like the 2007 Academy Awards, promos with rapper 50 Cent and comedian Jimmy Kimmel, and entertainment legends such as Bette Midler.

Now residing in LA, Susan Thompson understands how important healthy makeup is for the skin, as she continues to lend her flawless aesthetic to TV, film, commercials, webisodes, and newsworthy individuals.  She is embarking on a journey to share Thompson Cosmetics with the world.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
A completely Italian design and a fashion soul for a modern luxury: this is how Yookiss watches are born.
An idea which came to light some time ago by a group of national
businessmen who, after working for years with all their competence in
marketing, telecommunications and technology, decided to create a new
and young brand for people who love elegance around the clock.
<h3>New watches line, created and designed in Sicily, near Mt. Etna
The line of Yookiss watches puts fashion at the service of luxury: the
precious items of the collection, with some in limited edition, will be
able to add a touch of class and refinement to the wearer, winking at
modern and contemporary fashion. In other words, a must-have to show

with personality and style.

This new reality, born in Sicily, has been able to take its first steps
thanks to the self-financing, in order to create the fascinating
collection 2015, as Dionysus and Lady Silver, two pieces destined to
become objects of desire for thousands of fashion victims.
But the way is still very long and to continue this challenging project we need the help and support of everyone.
Thank to the crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo you will be able to
help the Yookiss brand to create precious models of fashionable watches,
which are perfect to satisfy every desire of style.
Through the rewards made available by the company, the project's
supporters will see, first in the world, precious watches totally made

and designed in Italy.


The total support for a project, as it is declined by crowdfunding
logics, becomes a pleasure when it is about items of style and look.
Plus, the rewards will make your help a precious allied in order to
reach the goal of the crowdfunding campaign which, in this case, will be
fundamental to bring to light a very high quality product while you
could be not only the proud holder of fashionable watches, but also the
In an international platform as Indigogo, universally recognized to be
the ideal place for crowdfunding campaigns, every supporter could give
his free contribution to Yookiss project which, in case of success, will
know to repay the trust granted in the best possible way.
