Hello to all!  My name is Kristina and I'm a senior at Moore College of Art and Design!  For the past 3 years I've been working towards my BFA in fashion design.  Since my sophomore year I've been hard at work learning about diffrent techniques and what goes into being a designer.  I also was lucky enough to spend my summer in New York Interning with Lela Rose.  I even got to help with fashion week.  After learning so much and working in the field, it is now my turn to show the community and the school what I have learned and showcase my own designs that represents me as a designer and as an artist.

I've always been passionate about fashion design, but there has always been something about bridal and wedding gowns that have really interested me.  I want to create a great bridal collection for the average women (or the ones who aren't afraid to take a chance) that's affordable, comfortable and memorable.  A wedding dress is the single most important dress in a woman's life and the most remembered.  My goal is to make something that any women could put on, look in the mirror and think ""Wow, I feel absolutely beautiful"" no matter their size.

That is why I am reaching out to you to help contribute to this idea that I have been pineing after for years.  As a senior I am required to present a collection composed of 3-5 pieces that will be shown at the Moore College of Art and Design annual fashion show. Although I keep a job, I am not able to raise enough money on my own and I could use all the help that I can get for this one!  In the past I have only needed to complete one outfit and this time I could be making as many as 5 gowns for the fashion show (now that's a lot of fabric) There are no more scholarships to apply for and not many other options for a senior in college to receive money so please, help a girl out!  I'm looking to raise about $1000 and with all of your help, we can do it!
So, let's look at it this way folks.  This is what goes into making a collection. I'll be needing:
• Over 10 yards of fabric somewhere in the $23-34/yd range. Fabric from NYC ain't cheap!
• Shoes, acessories AND bouquets for the models
It really adds up when you take the time to think about it.  A donation of $10 dollars could cover all the buttons for my collection!
But hold on, what's in it for you?
Starting from $5 up to $250 there's something in it for you.
$5 Gets you a hand written thank you card and a small surprise!
$10 Gets you a hand written thank you card and a friendship bracelet/necklace or anklet in your choice of colours*!
$25 Gets you a hand written thank you card and a screen print of my upcoming logo
$50 Gets you a custom hand written thank you card and a black and white photograph of my taking**!
$75 Gets you a custom hand written thank you card and a prize (or a comination of them) from the ones prevously mentioned
$100 Gets you a custom hand written thank you card a ticket to the show, a photograph of my taking and a screen print of the upcoming logo
$250 Gets you a custom hand written thank you card, 2 tickets to the show and a custom screen print of your choice!
*I have all the colours of the rainbow! And make sure to give me the size you need for the friendship bracelet!
**I mainly take photographs of landscapes and portraits of people.  I also have photographed animals from time to time :] Let me know which one you fancy and I'll send you examples of my photos.
All this and more can be yours if you just lend a helping hand!

Anything and everything helps in reaching my goal.  If I don't reach my goal of $1000 I'll still be using what I have been given to purchase my fabric for the collection, I'll take what I can get, every little bit helps.
The Impact: And how you'll win my heart,

For each donation that I recieve, you have no idea how happy it'll make me and how much you will have lightened the load on my shoulders.  Designing and fabricating a collection at a college level is tough stuff!  There is a lot more behind the scenes then what you may just see on TV like Project Runway.  This collection is something very important to me and will help benefit my future career.

My collection is something that everyone at school and people of the Philadelphia community will be seeing and I want to be able to have the chance to show them just what I'm made of!  The costs of materials, travel to and from NYC and extra accessories needed for the show really do add up and sometimes it's hard to keep your head above water.  I've been doing all that I can to save money for this but I can't do it alone..
Other ways you can help me out!

Share, share, share! Post the link to your facebook, forward the email, tweet it, reblog it spread the word!  I know that sometime you wanna help but you can't.  But by sharing my campaign with others we can expand the circle and keep this going.

And I cannot even begin to express my graditute to those who will help and those who will share this link.  Thank you so much and please feel free to follow me on tumblr for updates about how the collection is going and how your generous donating is aiding me in my senior collection.

Hi indiegogo community… thank you for visiting my page and checking out my project.
Hoping that along with your individual support you will feel comfortable to help me spread the word through email, twitter, facebook…..
Who I am and how I began designing pet carriers:

My name is Jamie – my background includes successful careers in retail management and television sales.  I had a small Yorkshire terrier named Lucy that I would take with me every where.  As Lucy grew older she became quite ill.  She had a degenerative disease that took her sight and she was in kidney failure.  It became more important then ever for me to find a way to keep Lucy by my side as much as possible.  The pet carrier that I owned at the time did not hold its shape and basically screamed “dog bag” so that I wasn’t able to conceal her as much as I would like.  You may have experienced this with your own carrier… when I would put Lucy inside her bag it would collapse all around her causing Lucy to be hot and uncomfortable.  As a result of being unable to find a stylish pet carrier on the market that could accommodate both of our needs, I set out to design the perfect bags.  My designs are unique because they look and function as both an everyday handbag and pet carrier.  In fact you probably wouldn’t even know that there was a pet inside!  In addition to creating structured bags that hold their shape for your pet’s safety (better ventilation) and comfort, I add such features as outside pockets for your personal items, adjustable leash/harness rings, an extra thick pet cushion with a removable and washable lining and a roll down window.  I design my bags to mirror some of the hottest trends in the fashion industry.
My project?  Aspen Tote Carrier…. Where fashion meets function!
To create a light weight
column2: >high fashion pet carrier that is
column3: >airline compliant, doubles as both a
column6: >safe and comfortable place for your pet, holds your
column7: >iPad and makes traveling easy by fitting securely on your

column2: >Structure of the tote: allows you to place the bag down on a flat surface while dining, shopping, traveling… without it collapsing on your pet… this is better for both comfort and ventilation

column1: What makes the Aspen Tote unique?
• Original design/fashion forward/colors and fabrics that are used in the handbag industry
• Holds it shape so that you can put it down while dining, shopping, traveling
• Mesh top so that it will close completely and be air-line compliant (I always recommend checking with each airline for their specifications before traveling)
• Adjustable leash/harness ring (only one in the industry) so that you can control how far your pet’s head can reach outside of the bag for SAFETY
• Attachable/adjustable strap to secure to your luggage handle
• Tabs to fasten to seatbelt in order to use the bag as a car seat
• Shoulder straps are long enough to fit over winter coats as well as summer jackets
• Micro-suede lining helps absorb perspiration keeping your pet dry
• Extra thick bottom cushion with a removable and machine washable cushion cover
• Zippered pocket for your iPad or personal items

My passion for animals, love for the fashion industry, a belief in quality products and a high level of customer service…. and most important the incredible feedback that I receive from people all over the world.  There is no greater complement then hearing from customers that use and enjoy my products.  I approach each of my designs with the idea that I am asking a fashion conscious woman to leave her handbag at home and to feel just as proud/confident in my carrier as a reflection of her personal style.  At the same time I am putting extra effort to insure your pet’s safety and comfort. This is what I wrote originally but James’s brother in law switched to below.. do you like below?
Thank YOU for helping this dream come true with indiegogo:

I am motivated by a love of my 2 best friends, Charlie and Spike and knowing that I can improve the travel experience for other pets and hopefully you or someone you love.  I hope that my passion for the fashion industry and belief in quality carriers shines through in each of my designs created.  I want to change the way we look at keeping our beloved friends at our side more often without risking their safety or comfort.  I approach each new carrier with the idea that I am asking a fashion conscious woman to leave her handbag at home and still feel proud/confident in her personal style while being able to bring her best friend along!
I would love to hear from you!  Here are a few kind words from fans of my recent carrier designs.
Handful of testimonials - (for more testimonials please click onto www.lucyslux.com – testimonial tab):

*I LOVE,LOVE,LOVE the Charlie bags. Please keep me on your e-mail list for future products and sales!
P.S. My husband who usually doesn't comment thinks they are great too.!
Judy – Fl

*Thanks again! I absolutely looove the Madison bag :) It's so well made and it's the perfect size for my little yorkie Starly :) She just hopped right in! I will need to purchase the Charlie soon before we go on our trip this summer.
Thank you,
Kim – Texas

*Jamie - Sammy is a 6.5 pound Yorkie. He will be seven years old in a few days and has always traveled in a purse type carrier. Of all the bags we have (L.V., Juicy, Brighton etc) your design is by far our favorite and most functional. ~Kim, Florida

*Jamie - I am very grateful to you, as well as my dog — you make the best bags in the world. I am very grateful for your help — your bags are magnificent and very nice for me and my dog. Thanks! ~Aelita, Russia

*Jamie - OMG these are sooooooo great ! Maggie LOVES the bags and was in them in seconds flat - I think to say MINE MINE MINE. I do get what you are saying about the Lucy - it is big but mostly because I see how you have constructed it to keep the shape. You get how to make these function easily as a carrier and purse. I like how the pockets are so reachable/user friendly - well done. OMG again I love! the Aspen Tote - that is going to be so perfect around town. ~Hilary, Seattle

*Dear Jamie, I have received bags (brown Aspen Tote and Silver Madison Carrier) - they are fine, super!!! Even better, than on promo photo!!!! I and my dog are happy!! Especial thanks for a...bear!!! Oh, simply magic bags!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Veeeeeery beautiful and convenient!!!!! Best wishes, ~Sveta, Kazakhstan

*We just landed and Lola couldn't have been better in her new Charlie Carrier. Usually she circles and pants sometimes depending on turbulence but all she did this time was circle twice and lay down to sleep. Didn’t even flinch when we landed. Hooray!! Even as I am waiting for my luggage the bag is so comfortable to wear on my shoulder and she is still out cold. Thank you so much! We now have a new favorite bag and know we will be flying with it lots! ~Carla, Canada

Every small business has the challenge that we can’t get prices down until we get volume up, but we can’t get volume up until we get the prices down (chicken in the egg problem).  Most get stuck either making prices higher at first, or sacrificing quality, or even being pushed to take manufacturing outside of the USA to save dollars.  Your Indiegogo support would allow me to place a larger production order of a min. of 100 Aspen Tote Carriers all at once.  In doing so I will be able to reduce the cost per item and pass this savings on directly to you.  In addition, this larger order will allow me to avoid buying outside of the USA, where we will have the opportunity to put up to 10 unemployed artisans back to work.
• Revised Aspen Tote Carrier has been designed (professional sketches completed)..
• Graphic designer and photographer ready for marketing updates

• Put additional styles back into production until I have a min. of 5 styles available at all times.  This would enable me to offer a variety of styles and sizes of my carriers as well as accessory items such as coordinating leashes, harnesses, collars, toys, bag blankie/teddy sets.

REWARDS:  First of all I want to thank everyone for their participation and to remind you that no amount is too small!  The opportunity that indiegogo presents is way beyond my individual project… it is an opportunity for small business and for each of us to support creativity, passion and hard work.

Starting as low as $10 you will receive different Lucy’s Luxuries products.  I have made my squeaky toys, bag blankie/teddy set, note cards, greeting card and even current bag inventory available as rewards.  Best of all… you will have the opportunity to
column2: >pre-order the brand new Aspen Tote carrier at a significantly reduced cost during this campaign.

column1: Please note:  for all reward options shipping is free within the US
International orders shipping cost are listed.  Items are shipped via the United States Post Office and the price is determined based on weight.

To create a light weight high fashion pet carrier that is airline compliant, doubles as both a car seat and  handbag, provides a safe and comfortable place for your pet, holds your iPad and makes traveling easy by fitting securely on your luggage handle.
Structure of the tote: allows you to place the bag down on a flat surface while dining, shopping, traveling… without it collapsing on your pet… this is better for both comfort and ventilation
What makes the Aspen Tote unique?
Original design/fashion forward/colors and fabrics that are used in the handbag industry

Attachable/adjustable strap to secure to your luggage handle
Tabs to fasten to seatbelt in order to use the bag as a car seat
Shoulder straps are long enough to fit over winter coats as well as summer jackets
Micro-suede lining helps absorb perspiration keeping your pet dry
Extra thick bottom cushion with a removable and machine washable cushion cover
Outside pockets for your personal items
Zippered pocket for your iPad or personal items

My passion for animals, love for the fashion industry, a belief in quality products and a high level of customer service…. and most important the incredible feedback that I receive from people all over the world.  There is no greater complement then hearing from customers that use and enjoy my products.  I approach each of my designs with the idea that I am asking a fashion conscious woman to leave her handbag at home and to feel just as proud/confident in my carrier as a reflection of her personal style.  At the same time I am putting extra effort to insure your pet’s safety and comfort. New developments in the Model Wars.
Regrouping to cover a greater scope. Here's an outline:
The Ugly Business of Beautiful Women by Michael Gross

In the last twenty years, modeling has grown from a small business conducted by a select elite to a huge industry whose stars are the world's most famous faces. Michael Gross has interviewed modeling's pioneers and survivors and has stories about all the greats: from Anita Colby, Suzy Parker, and Dorian Leigh to Jean Shrimpton, Twiggy, Cindy Crawford and Christy Turlington. By taking us into the studios and the parties and the cities where models play and are preyed upon, Gross tears down modeling's carefully constructed façade to reveal the untold truths of the ugly trade in pretty women.

AMANDA MASTERS, SIMON BEARDMORE, SZUZANNA BOROS, THOMAS BRADLEY, BARBARA CHEESEBOROUGH, JENNIFER CURRAN, CAROLYN FEARS, VALARIE GARDANO, DONNA GIBBS, BILL GOINS, CARLA GROSS (d/b/a SEBASTIAN CARDON), JUSTIN KLENTNER, ELEANORA MILLER, (a/k/a ELLE MILLER), VIRGINIA NELSON, ALICIA PINE, ANNE ROGAN, LORELEI SHELLIST, ANGELA SHELTON, LAURA SHOEMAKER, SHARON SIMON, TODD SNYDER, HILLARY SWAY, and MONICA WALKER, and on their own behalf and on behalf of a class of similarly situated persons,

WILHELMINA MODEL AGENCY, INC., FORD MODELS, INC., f/k/a FORD MODEL AGENCY, GERARD W. FORD, ELITE MODEL MANAGEMENT, INC., CLICK MODEL MANAGEMENT, INC., NEXT MANAGEMENT COMPANY, THE MFME MODEL MANAGEMENT COMPANY, LTD, a/k/a COMPANY MANAGEMENT, BOSS MODELS, INC., ZOLI MANAGEMENT, INC., Q MODEL MANAGEMENT, DNA MODEL MANAGEMENT, LLC, IMAGES MANAGEMENT, IMG MODELS, INC., and MODEL MANAGEMENT CORPORATION, f/k/a INTERNATIONAL MODEL MANAGERS ASSOCIATION, INC.,

<li>This is a class action under federal and state law on behalf of present and former professional models who are or have been under contract to Defendants, various New York modeling agencies. As set forth in detail below, Defendants are and have for several years been engaged in an unlawful combination and conspiracy to violate federal antitrust law and state law, and have each violated state law, including by<ol>
<li>conspiring to set the fees they each charge to models, and to fix other terms and conditions of the models' contracts, in violation of federal antitrust law

<li>concealing their unlawful conduct by drafting contracts purporting to characterize themselves as ""managers"" and disavowing any state licensing requirements – while advertising themselves as ""agencies"" and admitting (in court documents and elsewhere) that they regularly procure employment for models for a fee, making them employment agencies as a matter of law
<li>knowingly violating state law limiting the fees that Defendants, as employment agencies, can charge

• deliberately violating their fiduciary duties to their models through various other unlawful practices, such as earning undisclosed profits from third parties, billing models for phony expenses, making a profit from services required to be provided at cost, and imposing excessive charges and fees, as detailed below.
AMANDA MASTERS v. WILHELMINA MODEL AGENCY, INC., et al
A fairly independent group looking into basic rights and better working conditions:

ALWAYS have a business or entertainment lawyer look over any contracts you sign, from modeling schools up to working for a major agency! Also Google any companies or people for ""scams' or ""complaints"" as you will often be shocked.

This campaign will be eventually migrated to a longer-term project page, further news soon.

AMANDA MASTERS, SIMON BEARDMORE, SZUZANNA BOROS, THOMAS BRADLEY, BARBARA CHEESEBOROUGH, JENNIFER CURRAN, CAROLYN FEARS, VALARIE GARDANO, DONNA GIBBS, BILL GOINS, CARLA GROSS (d/b/a SEBASTIAN CARDON), JUSTIN KLENTNER, ELEANORA MILLER, (a/k/a ELLE MILLER), VIRGINIA NELSON, ALICIA PINE, ANNE ROGAN, LORELEI SHELLIST, ANGELA SHELTON, LAURA SHOEMAKER, SHARON SIMON, TODD SNYDER, HILLARY SWAY, and MONICA WALKER, and on their own behalf and on behalf of a class of similarly situated persons,

WILHELMINA MODEL AGENCY, INC., FORD MODELS, INC., f/k/a FORD MODEL AGENCY, GERARD W. FORD, ELITE MODEL MANAGEMENT, INC., CLICK MODEL MANAGEMENT, INC., NEXT MANAGEMENT COMPANY, THE MFME MODEL MANAGEMENT COMPANY, LTD, a/k/a COMPANY MANAGEMENT, BOSS MODELS, INC., ZOLI MANAGEMENT, INC., Q MODEL MANAGEMENT, DNA MODEL MANAGEMENT, LLC, IMAGES MANAGEMENT, IMG MODELS, INC., and MODEL MANAGEMENT CORPORATION, f/k/a INTERNATIONAL MODEL MANAGERS ASSOCIATION, INC.,

This is a class action under federal and state law on behalf of present and former professional models who are or have been under contract to Defendants, various New York modeling agencies. As set forth in detail below, Defendants are and have for several years been engaged in an unlawful combination and conspiracy to violate federal antitrust law and state law, and have each violated state law, including by
conspiring to set the fees they each charge to models, and to fix other terms and conditions of the models' contracts, in violation of federal antitrust law

concealing their unlawful conduct by drafting contracts purporting to characterize themselves as ""managers"" and disavowing any state licensing requirements – while advertising themselves as ""agencies"" and admitting (in court documents and elsewhere) that they regularly procure employment for models for a fee, making them employment agencies as a matter of law
knowingly violating state law limiting the fees that Defendants, as employment agencies, can charge

deliberately violating their fiduciary duties to their models through various other unlawful practices, such as earning undisclosed profits from third parties, billing models for phony expenses, making a profit from services required to be provided at cost, and imposing excessive charges and fees, as detailed below.
AMANDA MASTERS v. WILHELMINA MODEL AGENCY, INC., et al
A fairly independent group looking into basic rights and better working conditions:

ALWAYS have a business or entertainment lawyer look over any contracts you sign, from modeling schools up to working for a major agency! Also Google any companies or people for ""scams' or ""complaints"" as you will often be shocked.
This campaign will be eventually migrated to a longer-term project page, further news soon.",0.0,0,"4 Campaigns

column3: >Do you know the amount of women in the United States who wear a size 11 shoe?  Well, according to Footwear Market Insights, the number may be surprizing: it's 3%— a statistic that I happen to fall in. Upon my research, the number of  designers who accommodate women with this problem is even lower. And the amount of those companies who manufacture eco-friendly or eco-conscious designer shoes is—sadly—even less. The fashion industry is in dire need of replenishing its inventory of hard-to-find, high-fashion, women's shoes with a
column7: >to sustainable manufacturing. I founded deeFind Shoes partially due to my frustration of being a size 11, with slim to no options of finding desirable shoes.  As a purveyor of fashion, I grew more and more frustrated
column8: rather than complain about my dilemma, I decided to take control and employ my creative energy, passion and desire to solve this problem, while achieving my dream of becoming an entrepreneur.  My vision rapidly began to unfold. I developed a line that focuses on hard-to-find shoes from sizes 6 to 12.  Furthering my thought process of brand development, I knew I had to stay true to my identity and morale. The name deeFind emerged from two subjects: my nickname (people call me Dee) and my created treasures, or 'finds'.  What I really want to accomplish with my brand is to offer these shoes as a tool: wearing a beautiful pair of deeFind Shoes could empower women to stand confident, while ferociously approaching their own dreams, head on. deeFind is much more than another shoe company of utility. It is a growing movement of everyday women stepping into the arena of their big dreams.  And from a company perspective, a solid vision involving eco-conscious manufacturing practices with the intention of raising awareness on everything from where our products originate and who is making them, to contributing to solutions to problems immersed in
column12: >. One of the ways that I believe we can improve our community is by cultivating thoughtful design and introducing more sustainable materials into our products. One of our goals is to—eventually—design a fully recyclable high-heel shoe . . . and we are moving steadily in that direction.  Each season we are adding different material applications to help meet this objective.  For our Spring/Summer 2012 collection, we are so proud to announce that our high heels are constructed from recycled tires, our soles are made from recycling old soles, and our boxes and tissue paper are made from recyclable materials.  Additionally, we use a myriad of breathtaking faux leathers
column13: the treatment and methods of the tanning industry can be pretty brutal. In the upcoming seasons, we plan to introduce more sustainable and up-cycled
column17: >.  As a startup company, it is exorbitantly expensive to preserve quality, while utilizing sustainable materials, when ordering small quantities. Moreover, larger material orders are sometimes required to access such stunning alternatives, which is nearly impossible with my budget. We are fanatical about the continuation of producing high quality, handmade shoes and expanding on our vision of making a high-fashion high heel that is eco-friendly.  Lastly, deeFind is committed to working within our community. With each season, deeFind takes a percentage of each pair of shoes sold and donates the profits to a special charity. Sleeping sound at night is unachievable without deeFind fulfilling its obligation to return the gift of support to our community, in whatever capacity that may be.

column1: The Impact Of This Campaign Reaches Many

column5: >It's no secret that your investment directly benefits deeFind, though, the secondary benefits greatly impact everyone who is linked to this business. deeFind creates jobs for people who share a similar passion. with closely aligned dreams. My Creative Director—Melina Jones—whose vision, skills, dedication and energy are a crucial in keeping the identity of deeFind thriving and alive.  She works endless hours, more than I can afford to pay, because she is a devout believer in the deeFind dream.  Within my community, I network and contract out for photographers, makeup artists, marketing and PR because I want to support individuals and entrepreneurs just like me, chasing after and fighting for their dreams.  We have created opportunities to guide and mentor others who wish to work within the shoe industry. With my manufacturer in Mexico, I am trying to provide workers with a livable wage in relation to their economy so they can help sustain their families.

column3: >This business has been an exhausting challenge: pulling dozens of all-nighters, endless hours of research, wearing many different hats—mostly at the same time—all while filling many vacant roles in our company. As a business owner, I have exploited every penny from my bank account to keep this business afloat.  Building a business from the ground up can be challenging—especially when its being constructed grass-roots style with zero capital.  We believe so much in the enormous potential of deeFind, which is why we want the investor to be YOU: The people who believe in my vision, product, and the future of deeFind.  And our future is bright.  We need more companies who thrive on the morale of conservation and ethics, which is why this campaign is so critical
column4: we really need to begin shifting the way we conduct business: unite, work together, build each other up.  We have the power to get there, but we do need investors like you in order to be successful.

column1: The True Definition Of A Sole Proprietor

column3: >I am it.  No additional funding sources or investors, beside myself.  I saved up money over the years to invest in my dream.  I have placed every penny I have into deeFind along with my heart and determination because I have never felt so sure about anything in my life. I will continue to self-fund my business on my own as long as I can sustain, though it would be refreshing not to see the numbers in the red. The objective is to raise $10,000 towards my production run for my Spring/Summer 2012 collection.  This amount does not cover all my expenses but if we raised that amount, it would give me a bit of a buffer where I could put $8,000 towards my production costs and $2,000 towards important expenses such as photo shoots, a look book, public relations and marketing.  If I don't meet my goal I will still allocate 80% towards production and the other 20% to public relations and marketing.  To keep our deeFind 'Dream Team' vision alive, we are depending on you.

column5: >We have some really great perks to offer in return for your contribution. Know your help means the world to all of us here at deeFind! No words can express my gratitude for your support.Truly, from the bottom of my heart and with everything that I have, THANK GOODNESS FOR YOU!

column3: >If you are unable to help fiscally at this time, I truly understand.  But, what would be incredible is if you would share the video and Indie GoGo campaign to your loved ones and friends.  Spread the word and make some noise to let people know what deeFind stands for . . . YOU!

column1: *deeFind HAS MADE CHANGES TO THIS CAMPAIGN posted March 22, 2012

Beloved contributors,

We would love to thank every single one of you for supporting the efforts of deeFind Shoes. Though we have not made it to our halfway point, we have managed to raise $1160.00 to date. The journey during the past month has been explosively busy and exciting. This includes a monkey wrench with regard to our collection of gorgeous, wearable works of art for Spring/Summer 2012.

About two weeks ago, we learned that there had been a critical manufacturing error that could not be reversed. Further, we received news that the facilities of our manufacturer had been dismantled and with no other manufacturing resources, and were left to do one of two things: either throw in the towel, or work with what had been given to us. We chose the latter.

From the moment of conception, deeFind has been a staunch employer of quality—from the first sketch of ideas to the boxes and tissue paper our shoes are presented in. We have decided to chalk up this hiccup as a test, one which asks, ""How badly do you want this?"" Let me respond on behalf of all the employees at deeFind: our appetite to succeed by attacking our dreams of deeFind's potential is nothing less than ferocious. We are not letting this stand in our way. We will continue to advance forward in the direction of deeFind's destination and our IndieGoGo campaign—with you all right behind us. What this will mean are a few things. 1) For the most part, the perks will stay the same. Some contributors may see a slight difference in the merchandise they will receive, 2) the Spring/Summer 2012 collection is now cataloged as a Spring/Summer concept shoe, one that will not be launched as a full line, rather available by appointment only sessions, private parties and small wholesale events, and 3) our original description on our IndieGoGo page indicated that the funds raised would be allocated to the manufacturing and marketing &
column2:
promotions budget, though now, those funds raised will be distributed to the next line of deeFind projects for the remainder of 2012 and Spring/Summer 2013.

We are immensely grateful to everyone for their staunch support and love throughout this time and hope that you continue to contribute as much as you can. If you feel compelled to do so, we would love to get as much attention as possible, so mention our efforts to your friends and loved-ones. We feel so honored to be part of an amazing community. As events occur, we will make certain to keep everyone posted. Until then, stay fierce!

With Feminine Ferocity,


The deeFiind Dream Team

column1: ","deeFind HAS MADE CHANGES TO THIS CAMPAIGN!
*Please read our note written after the following description for an important announcement concerning our campaign and the perks offered by donating!

Do you know the amount of women in the United States who wear a size 11 shoe?  Well, according to Footwear Market Insights, the number may be surprizing: it's 3%— a statistic that I happen to fall in. Upon my research, the number of  designers who accommodate women with this problem is even lower. And the amount of those companies who manufacture eco-friendly or eco-conscious designer shoes is—sadly—even less. The fashion industry is in dire need of replenishing its inventory of hard-to-find, high-fashion, women's shoes with a commitment to sustainable manufacturing. I founded deeFind Shoes partially due to my frustration of being a size 11, with slim to no options of finding desirable shoes.  As a purveyor of fashion, I grew more and more frustrated
column2: rather than complain about my dilemma, I decided to take control and employ my creative energy, passion and desire to solve this problem, while achieving my dream of becoming an entrepreneur.  My vision rapidly began to unfold. I developed a line that focuses on hard-to-find shoes from sizes 6 to 12.  Furthering my thought process of brand development, I knew I had to stay true to my identity and morale. The name deeFind emerged from two subjects: my nickname (people call me Dee) and my created treasures, or 'finds'.  What I really want to accomplish with my brand is to offer these shoes as a tool: wearing a beautiful pair of deeFind Shoes could empower women to stand confident, while ferociously approaching their own dreams, head on. deeFind is much more than another shoe company of utility. It is a growing movement of everyday women stepping into the arena of their big dreams.  And from a company perspective, a solid vision involving eco-conscious manufacturing practices with the intention of raising awareness on everything from where our products originate and who is making them, to contributing to solutions to problems immersed in our community. One of the ways that I believe we can improve our community is by cultivating thoughtful design and introducing more sustainable materials into our products. One of our goals is to—eventually—design a fully recyclable high-heel shoe . . . and we are moving steadily in that direction.  Each season we are adding different material applications to help meet this objective.  For our Spring/Summer 2012 collection, we are so proud to announce that our high heels are constructed from recycled tires, our soles are made from recycling old soles, and our boxes and tissue paper are made from recyclable materials.  Additionally, we use a myriad of breathtaking faux leathers
column3: the treatment and methods of the tanning industry can be pretty brutal. In the upcoming seasons, we plan to introduce more sustainable and up-cycled leathers.  As a startup company, it is exorbitantly expensive to preserve quality, while utilizing sustainable materials, when ordering small quantities. Moreover, larger material orders are sometimes required to access such stunning alternatives, which is nearly impossible with my budget. We are fanatical about the continuation of producing high quality, handmade shoes and expanding on our vision of making a high-fashion high heel that is eco-friendly.  Lastly, deeFind is committed to working within our community. With each season, deeFind takes a percentage of each pair of shoes sold and donates the profits to a special charity. Sleeping sound at night is unachievable without deeFind fulfilling its obligation to return the gift of support to our community, in whatever capacity that may be.

column1: The Impact Of This Campaign Reaches Many

It's no secret that your investment directly benefits deeFind, though, the secondary benefits greatly impact everyone who is linked to this business. deeFind creates jobs for people who share a similar passion. with closely aligned dreams. My Creative Director—Melina Jones—whose vision, skills, dedication and energy are a crucial in keeping the identity of deeFind thriving and alive.  She works endless hours, more than I can afford to pay, because she is a devout believer in the deeFind dream.  Within my community, I network and contract out for photographers, makeup artists, marketing and PR because I want to support individuals and entrepreneurs just like me, chasing after and fighting for their dreams.  We have created opportunities to guide and mentor others who wish to work within the shoe industry. With my manufacturer in Mexico, I am trying to provide workers with a livable wage in relation to their economy so they can help sustain their families.

This business has been an exhausting challenge: pulling dozens of all-nighters, endless hours of research, wearing many different hats—mostly at the same time—all while filling many vacant roles in our company. As a business owner, I have exploited every penny from my bank account to keep this business afloat.  Building a business from the ground up can be challenging—especially when its being constructed grass-roots style with zero capital.  We believe so much in the enormous potential of deeFind, which is why we want the investor to be YOU: The people who believe in my vision, product, and the future of deeFind.  And our future is bright.  We need more companies who thrive on the morale of conservation and ethics, which is why this campaign is so critical
column2: we really need to begin shifting the way we conduct business: unite, work together, build each other up.  We have the power to get there, but we do need investors like you in order to be successful.

column1: The True Definition Of A Sole Proprietor

I am it.  No additional funding sources or investors, beside myself.  I saved up money over the years to invest in my dream.  I have placed every penny I have into deeFind along with my heart and determination because I have never felt so sure about anything in my life. I will continue to self-fund my business on my own as long as I can sustain, though it would be refreshing not to see the numbers in the red. The objective is to raise $10,000 towards my production run for my Spring/Summer 2012 collection.  This amount does not cover all my expenses but if we raised that amount, it would give me a bit of a buffer where I could put $8,000 towards my production costs and $2,000 towards important expenses such as photo shoots, a look book, public relations and marketing.  If I don't meet my goal I will still allocate 80% towards production and the other 20% to public relations and marketing.  To keep our deeFind 'Dream Team' vision alive, we are depending on you.

We have some really great perks to offer in return for your contribution. Know your help means the world to all of us here at deeFind! No words can express my gratitude for your support.Truly, from the bottom of my heart and with everything that I have, THANK GOODNESS FOR YOU!
Other Ways You Can Help deeFind

If you are unable to help fiscally at this time, I truly understand.  But, what would be incredible is if you would share the video and Indie GoGo campaign to your loved ones and friends.  Spread the word and make some noise to let people know what deeFind stands for . . . YOU!

Anthony ""Tony"" Kirkpatrick, was born October 10, 1996. He died November 20, 2014. He was the beloved son of Jeff Kirkpatrick and Glenda Pierce and brother of Ryan Kirkpatrick. Tony was a senior at Lincoln East High School. He attended Maxey Elementary and Lux Middle Schools. Tony had a big heart, and he loved I Heart Shirts, reading, gardening with his dad, hiking, camping, and soccer. He valued the time he spent with his big brother. He was a wonderful friend to many.

Tony especially loved music, and he was passionate about playing the marimba. He was in the East High Marching Band, Blue Note Jazz Band, Wind Ensemble, Pep Band and an after-school Percussion Group he recently formed at East. He was in the pit crew for the 2013 and 2014 fall musicals at East and for the 2014 East Show Choir. Tony was in the Math Club at East, and treasurer of Tri-M. He was a member of Boy Scout Troop 25 and later Venture Crew Troop 25.

Tony had a rare style, spirit, and sense of life that brought joy to all those who came in contact with him. Tony's passing leaves a huge hole in the lives of all who knew him.

We are collecting money for shirts in his honor. 

 If you need a set of sizes that are not listed (one medium, one small) either ""Pledge"" twice, or make a pledge of the total and I will make the contact with you when the project is completed.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word online
  • Share this with your family and friends

And that's all there is to it.

We are Empowered Apparel UK. Thanks for looking at our page.

As we explained in the video above, we are two young women based in two different cities. Together, we hold one aim - to produce feminist merchandise that is ethically sourced from within the United Kingdom.
We are a workers co-operative, we are sourcing locally and ultimately, we are producing great things for people to show their support for the liberation cause.
We are asking for £500 to help us kick start our business. Along with this, we will both be making a cash injection, but want to ensure we can launch with as many products as possible.
£100 Start up costs - domains, registering as a company etc
If we don't reach our goal, we still get to keep what we receive, due to the flexible funding option.

Sourcing feminist merchandise from the US is expensive - both to the planet and to our bank balance. Not to mention, any costs from the production of the merch. By producing it in the UK, we can ensure our suppliers fit the values of us and you, our customers.

It's not just that. Women only account for 17% of UK business owners. By existing, we're helping to solve inequality itself. And, by more women owning and wearing our merchandise, we're hoping to help change the narrative towards feminism.
We'll also be donating to charities and NGOs each month, like Women's Aid, Verity, Rape Crisis and more, so we can ensure that your money goes into helping the cause.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still help us out!

  • Please get the word out about our campaign and ensure some noise is made
  • &
column2: if you think you have a valuable skill to offer us, we'd love to hear from you

column1: We are Empowered Apparel UK. Thanks for looking at our page.

As we explained in the video above, we are two young women based in two different cities. Together, we hold one aim - to produce feminist merchandise that is ethically sourced from within the United Kingdom.
We are a workers co-operative, we are sourcing locally and ultimately, we are producing great things for people to show their support for the liberation cause.
What We Need & What You Get
We are asking for £500 to help us kick start our business. Along with this, we will both be making a cash injection, but want to ensure we can launch with as many products as possible.
£380 Producing our first line of products
£100 Start up costs - domains, registering as a company etc
£20 Research and Development - products (Buying samples), packaging.
If we don't reach our goal, we still get to keep what we receive, due to the flexible funding option.

Sourcing feminist merchandise from the US is expensive - both to the planet and to our bank balance. Not to mention, any costs from the production of the merch. By producing it in the UK, we can ensure our suppliers fit the values of us and you, our customers.

It's not just that. Women only account for 17% of UK business owners. By existing, we're helping to solve inequality itself. And, by more women owning and wearing our merchandise, we're hoping to help change the narrative towards feminism.
We'll also be donating to charities and NGOs each month, like Women's Aid, Verity, Rape Crisis and more, so we can ensure that your money goes into helping the cause.

Other Ways You Can Help If you can't contribute financially, you can still help us out!  Please get the word out about our campaign and ensure some noise is made & if you think you have a valuable skill to offer us, we'd love to hear from you

column6:
>Crazy Wolf Design : About Us

Crazy Wolf design is a new clothing brand based in Cincinnati,Ohio. It started 2 years ago by Thandiwe Fegan
column7:
He wanted to create unique and fun clothing that would spark peoples imaginations. 

He also wanted to give people a chance to show who they are or who they want to be . Crazy Wolf designs finds inspiration from Movies,TV Shows,Video Games, and anything the Crazy Wolf pack (Staff) come up with. Crazy Wolf's goal is to help turn the wearer of the clothing to become the Hero,Princess that kicks butt, The Spy or anything that comes to your imagination.  Become who you imagine!


Crazy Wolf is run in a basement in Cincinnati with 3 staff members including Thandiwe himself. To see some of the designs we have created check out the Gallery!

That Sounds Awesome! How can we Help? 

With Your contributions crazy wolf can create awesome clothing that would send a spark into the great world of Clothing Design. 

We are wanting to get some of the designs patterns done by a company that offers Digitizing and Optimization services. This will help us give the patterns to  Manufacturers to make the final product in bulk. Right now we are planning on creating patterns and construct certain clothing Items (like for vest)on our own. 

Crazy Wolf Design is trying to raise $16,000. What will that amount cover? Here is a list of a few of the needs that will be met with your help!

column1: • The Digitizing and Optimization of our Design patterns.
• Machinery for creating Certain designs right then and there, No waiting.
What sort of perks are we offering for your contributions?
column7: > We appreciate our supports so much that we created some Awesome Perks!

column1: Fan- $1: You will receive a thank you card from all of us at Crazy Wolf!

column3: >Wolf Fan - $25: With $25 You will receive a Crazy Wolf Epic poster!

column1: Wolf Dreamer- $50: You get an awesome shirt in your size, as well as the Epic poster!
Crazy Wolf Artist - $75 You will get everything below this plus a Original Crazy Wolf Sketch signed by the Wolf himself!
Green Moon V.I.P- $100 Well as V.I.P You get some Amazing extra gear.

column3: >You can help us create a new look. Send in sketches or just describe to us what you would like to see in a design. We will sketch it out and send it to you. Your design might be the next to be made to wear!

column1: Crazy Wolf Blue Moon V.I.P -$350 You receive all the perks in a Crazy Wolf Backpack!

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you cannot contribute at this time. Perhaps there is some other way to support the fund:
• Share this page. Make some noise, via Facebook, or twitter, or even tumblr!
• Get the word out about Crazy Wolf  Design, use the share tools below to show your friends our Facebook Page!  If they see what we do, they might become inspired to help out.

Thank You For your Support!

Crazy Wolf Artist - $75 You will get everything below this plus a Original Crazy Wolf Sketch signed by the Wolf himself!
Green Moon V.I.P- $100 Well as V.I.P You get some Amazing extra gear.

Imagine That!- $150   You can help us create a new look. Send in sketches or just describe to us what you would like to see in a design. We will sketch it out and send it to you. Your design might be the next to be made to wear!
Crazy Wolf Blue Moon V.I.P -$350 You receive all the perks in a Crazy Wolf Backpack!
Other Ways You Can HelpWe completely understand if you cannot contribute at this time. Perhaps there is some other way to support the fund:
Share this page. Make some noise, via Facebook, or twitter, or even tumblr!
Get the word out about Crazy Wolf  Design, use the share tools below to show your friends our Facebook Page!  If they see what we do, they might become inspired to help out.

Our Story...

PUSH Hard, Tread Light
We are PUSHunderground and we decided to do things a different way. A totally different way. Let's start from the beginning.
Did you know that Americans use 2.5 million plastic bottles every hour? And recycle about 9% of it? Most of it goes straight to the landfill and do you know what happens once it gets to the landfill?

Nothing. It just sits there. So... we asked ourselves if there was anyway that we could make the very best sportswear out of plastic water bottles. And we found out that yes, not only can we make clothing out of recycle plastic bottles, but we can make it better.
We've watched hundreds, maybe thousands, of hours of workouts. We have asked countless athletes to tell us the best and worst thing about what they trained in.
They've described for us exactly where they needed the clothes to move and where they needed them to stay put. And we made what the athletes wanted.

We make our clothing right here in America, at a family-run factory close to home. PUSHunderground wants to help put Americans back to work. And beyond that, our factory is local, so our carbon footprint is light.
But that is not all we wanted to do. Where could we and our customers make the biggest difference?

Water... we could take on the crisis of clean, safe water. Did you know in water scarce communities girls as young as 8 will spend up to 5 hours a day collecting water? They will spend their lifetime collecting water? Instead of going to school? Or starting a business?
At PUSHunderground for every purchase you make, we will donate a portion of the proceeds to building wells in water scarce communities around the world. Together we can make a difference.

This is not our first rodeo. We understand what it takes to have a successful production run of high-quality garments. But experience does not eliminate all risks. Timing is our biggest risk. We have worked with our factory before on production runs and have had excellent turn around times. We plan to have everything shipped to you no later than March 2014.

Shoes For Orphans

Last week I brought a group from all over Canada to an orphanage in Guatemala to work with kids aged between 1 month old and 17 years old. 

The experience is called GIVE &
column2:
GROW and the concept is we give of ourselves unconditionally and in turn grow as people. 

The Emotional Need

These kids need to be held, engaged and to be shown that someone cares about them. In short, they matter.

The Physical Need

The reality is that many of the kids had shoes that were falling apart while others had the toes cut out of them so their toes could stick out. We presented about 35 pairs of shoes while there and many of the kids were in tears with appreciation. 

The goal is to give a pair of new shoes to each kid that needs them by Christmas. 

GIVE WITHOUT GOING -
column3:
>For some a visit to an orphanage in a foreign land is out of the question but we had a number of requests for help so that is why this page exists.

What will be the retail price after the Indiegogo campaign?

After the Indiegogo campaign ends, the total collection will be available on February 2016 and the retail price for the HD Urban Owl sunglasses will be 125 euro.

Do Urban Owl
sunglasses protect your eyes from harmful rays and do they prevent eye strain?
Urban Owl sunglasses feature UV400 protection, blocking 100%
of UV harmful rays. Also they have High Definition features and a Blue Light
Control filter, preventing eye strain and fatigue.
sunglasses FDA approved and do they comply with CE European Standards?
Urban Owl sunglasses are FDA approved and they comply with
CE European Standards, also they follow the latest standards of ISO 12312-1:2013
Owl lens special in comparison to other lenses?
High Definition lenses provide a new experience in vision.
The special tint used in combination with the Blue Control filter neutralize
blue light, preventing eye strain and fatigue. From the moment you will try out
our new HD lenses you won’t be able to go back to ordinary lenses.
Yes all Urban Owl models are suitable for prescription
lenses. The material of the frame is Acetate material, the most suitable
material for prescription sunglasses and optical frames. Your optician will be
able to glaze and adjust your prescription lenses.

through our site(horrorinclay.com), and contacted many artisans and
events. All we need now is subscribers!

plan to randomly select one Starter MugCrate to upgrade to a Deluxe

funding goal in this campaign, the numbers of upgrades will increase as
well as we will be upgrading some Deluxe crates to ultracrate status.

for the past 5 years, and have experience shipping Tiki mugs, fulfilling 3

A little bit about myself or how a dime can

column1: in a thrift store for 10 cents. About 10 years ago, I purchased a tiki mug for
my boyfriend at the time for 10 cents. This started his quest and obsession to
possess more Tiki mugs and other collectibles. From that one mug, he has built
up a collection of hundreds of unique Tiki mugs from around the world. As well
as, many art pieces, recipe books, syrups, bitters, bar tools, coasters,
swizzles, matchbooks, and the list goes on. If it is a unique piece of Tiki or
Polynesian-pop, then he wants to have it in his collection.

column1: he has started his own Tiki mug company specializing in literary horror Tiki
mugs - Horror In Clay. We started this company together over his want to own
one Cthulhu mug and now we have shipped over 1,000 around the world. (He is the
designer. I am the logistics and numbers person.) During this 5 year roller
coaster ride, I have learned fascinating things about ceramics, Tiki art, and
of course the best ways to drink rum. I continue this learning adventure
the rum hole the more we find out about new small artisans, educational groups,
events, and tiki bars. So a couple of years ago I started a wish list that I
add to all the time of things as well as places and events I want to and more
importantly my husband wants to attend. I plan to use this list as a starting
point for the first year of MugCrate as I continue to find more awesome things
for the collection. I hope to take this passion and bring it to you or your
favorite Tikiphile. And of course getting a present in the mail once a quarter
that you can only imagine what might be inside is fun as well.
daughter for being ok with the possibility of even more boxes of Tiki stuff in
our house. And of my husband for his encouragement of me moving forward with
this idea. Of course, I think he will love being my continued source of inspiration
for new gifts for him and the MugCrate recipients.
as far as having the knowledge and background to make this kind of project
easier. I have been working with my husband (we run Horror In Clay) to pack and
ship mugs around the world for the last 5 years. We have learned the ins and
outs of packaging ceramics and shipping them out.
unique challenge of shipping everything at once instead of one order at a time,
but after doing the logistics part of multiple Kickstarters for Horror In Clay
and others, I have some tricks and systems in place to help handle that as
well. Also, I just helped run a Mutant Mystery Box fulfillment for Horror In
Clay to test out the best way to pack and ship this type of item.
I believe the biggest challenge for me will be making sure to
balance the number of MugCrates sold with the number of items the artisans have
on hand to sell. We are talking to artisans all over the world that are used to
selling one at a time or a few at most, so we will be working ahead to make
sure to balance the time lines for the artist to bring you interesting, unique,
and ""must have"" things for your collection.
","MugCrate is a quarterly subscription box for lovers of Tiki mugs and all things Polynesian-pop! Just Subscribe, Unbox, & Enjoy!
MugCrate is borne of a sincere
desire to expose Tiki fans new and old to the best the Tiki movement has
to offer (and a desire to make gift giving a little more enjoyable for
So far in the evolution of this
project, we've built a screen printing rig and learned to print boxes,
priced out a year's worth of boxes, run a ""MugCrate test""
through our site(horrorinclay.com), and contacted many artisans and
events. All we need now is subscribers!
As a gift to our subscribers, we
plan to randomly select one Starter MugCrate to upgrade to a Deluxe
MugCrate for every 100 MugCrates sold per quarter.  If we exceed our
funding goal in this campaign, the numbers of upgrades will increase as
well as we will be upgrading some Deluxe crates to ultracrate status.
We feel we can do this with a
high degree of reliability and quality because my husband and I have run a
for the past 5 years, and have experience shipping Tiki mugs, fulfilling 3
successful Kickstarters, and managing product launches, along with many
contacts in the Tiki world...we can absolutely do this.
Pledge now! (then come back and read the rest!)
Types of things that might show up in a MugCrate.
platform to create curated boxes suitable for treating Tiki collectors to a fun
experience every quarter. I hope to expose Tiki collectors new and
old to lesser known events, artists, and goods they've never seen that they will
preparing for launch and raising funds through Indiegogo to help speed the
process. Because we work with independent creators as well as established
companies, the margins are slim, which means it is essential that we purchase
in as large a quantity as possible in order to keep our costs low. These funds
will allow us to buy our advance inventory in larger batches and help us keep
MugCrate accessible to as many subscribers as possible.
the better your boxes! We've already plotted the costs of our first year of
operation — if we exceed our goals, we'll use those funds to make your MugCrate
even more shiny!  Our budget will be based on funds that we have already
spent to start acquiring goods and production setup, funds we raise through
this campaign, and sales of future quarter MugCrates after the campaign ends.
The whole year you say? What'cha thinking?

Tsanta Claus is Coming.... - Mid December

column1: But.....we decided to make CoolRay even better!
Sunglasses that are more than just Sunglasses - IT'S AN EXPERIENCE!

Sleek Super-cool look, Super-quality sound, Military strength noise reduction, Voice prompt that reads out Incoming call numbers, charging and pairing status, UV 400 polarized protection, Patent pending FULL Bone Conduction technology and a host of other cool features!

CoolRay is a step-up in innovative bone conduction technology making them very unique sunglasses that are light years ahead of other sunglasses. We started working on this in 2014, spending day & night to arrive at a first iteration model (what you see here is the next generation model). We had over 2000 fans raving about our first version sunglasses when they came out towards the end of 2015.
But we did not stop there...
MULTI-TASKING SUNGLASSES POWERED BY FULL BONE CONDUCTION TECHNOLOGY
Ultra-lifestyle and wireless freedom with sophisticated wearable technology
Wireless range (10 mts). Clear communication through the wall & roof
Enjoy music & communicate anywhere, anytime totally hands-free
Raise your awareness by having your ears open to the surrounding environment
Battery power indicator on iOS and most Android smartphones. (If the Android phone has the functionality, it can indicate the power status)
Pairing & auto-connection to two (2) Bluetooth devices simultaneously
Military strength noise reduction and significantly reduced sound leakage

Flexible and comfortable nose pads transmit sound waves through nasal bones. The unique microphone technology eliminates over 90% ambient noise, allowing the person on the other end hear you with crystal clarity
Full Bone conduction technology (receive & transmit sound waves via the skull bone). No need for earplugs or messy wires to connect to your Bluetooth device
Voice prompt that will read out the incoming call number, as well as charging & pairing status
Made of Resin, Scratch and wear resistant, Waterproof & Long lasting
What's All The Talk About Bone Conduction?
BAE Systems adapts bone conduction technology to aid soldiers in the battlefield
What Can You Do With CoolRay?
If you're myopic, fit in your prescription lens right within and enjoy the many benefits of CoolRay
Charge and wear as normal sunglasses and make heads turn
Pair them with your favorite mobile Bluetooth enabled device and get connected
Enjoy your favorite music while Biking, Hiking, Climbing...the list goes on
Get alerted by a sweet female voice for incoming call (reads the number)
Reject an incoming call if you don't want to answer it
Should you answer the call, music is paused automatically
Finish the call, the music continues from where it left off automatically
Redial the last call number to call again
Know your sunglass' battery usage on iOS & most Android systems
Pair it with a second Bluetooth enabled device and use simultaneously
Option to use a normal microphone when in a quiet environment and the bone conduction microphone in a noisy environment (planned)
Know the temperature, altitude etc. via an ""App"" on your mobile device when hiking, skiing, mountain climbing, rock climbing etc. (planned)
aptX technology delivers top-notch CD quality sound (planned)
Like It! Love It! Live It!
What If I'm Wearing Prescription Lenses? No Problem, We Got You Covered!
GET THE MOST ADVANCED FULL BONE CONDUCTION SUNGLASSES ON THE PLANET

They call it the ""Machine"". Fight environmental sound and UV rays with a commanding advantage. CoolRay empowers you with awareness because your ears are completely open to the environment, at the same time the Nasal bone conduction technology behind it eliminates the ambient noise by 90% and delivers pure conversation to the other person. Its virtually impact-resistant lens provides the best UV protection that money can buy.
What Makes CoolRay Lens So Special?
COMPATIBLE PROFILES:  A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, HFP

Our vision is to create a more healthy, peaceful, and productive world through a fundamental shift in the way people understand and handle their stress response.
TouchPoints™ basic are non-invasive neuroscientific lifestyle wearables that use patent pending technology to relieve stress, improve sleep, and increase focus.
Thousands of TouchPoints™
column3: '> users report over 70%
column5: '> reduction in stress in just 30 sec

column3: '>Simply use them for 15 minutes every morning to get your day started right and throughout the day as needed to keep you in a peaceful state of mind.

column1: The TouchPoint Solution™ was founded on a belief in conscious capitalism which is integrated in every area of the company from our Touch of Hope Scholarship program to working with local vendors and individuals with disabilities. In honor of #GivingTuesday, we are highlighting our Scholarship program among our other initiatives that give back to the community.

Touch of Hope Scholarship. Every month, we donate dozens of TouchPoints™ to individuals in need via our Touch Of Hope Scholarship Fund. Individuals can apply by completing a simple form. To date we have given away hundreds of TouchPoints™ to deserving families. We recently dedicated our scholarship program to MacKenzie Briant, a young girl very near and dear to all of our hearts here at The TouchPoint Solution™. Watch her inspiring story below...

column2: t=1s"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">Packaging and Fulfillment by Individuals with disabilities. Each and every one of our products are packaged and fulfilled by individuals with epilepsy and other developmental disabilities.

column1: Utilization of Local Companies for packaging, graphics, printing, and carry bags.

column2: >Let's break this down into three steps:

column1: • Reduce Body Sensations: When you think of something stressful, you get an associated body sensation - think stomach butterflies or tightness in the chest. Touchpoints™ users report over 70% reduction in body sensations within 30 seconds by altering the body’s stress mechanism.

• Shift Fight or Flight Response: When you're stressed, the fight or flight part of your brain (sympathetic nervous system) engages. TouchPoints™ shifts you into the logical, rational part of your brain (parasympathetic nervous system). Now when you think about something stressful, it doesn't seem as stressful anymore.

• Create New Neural Pathways: When you think of something stressful without a body sensation and while in the rational part of your brain, you create a new neural pathway that is neutral to positive. This has a lasting effect in your brain reducing stress over time and is why TouchPoints™ were derived from one of the only successful treatments for PTSD.

GENERAL STRESS: Many of our customers use TouchPoints™ regularly for general stress in their day-to-day lives. General stress can affect not only one's mental, but also physical well-being. TouchPoints™ help restore a peaceful and healthy mind and body.

column2: >Case Studies show over a 90% reduction in stress headaches, increase in quality of sleep, and increase in productivity with use of TouchPoints™.

column1: SLEEPLESSNESS: TouchPoints™ utilize proven Bi-Lateral Stimulation technology to help you fall asleep as well as go back to sleep if you wake up in the middle of the night. Proven to physically block the body's stress response by reducing beta activity in the brain and allow you a more restful night.

column2: >Case Studies show 30 minutes faster sleep onset without the need for sleeping pills as well as an 80% reduction in wakefulness.

column1: On a hot Arizona morning in late 2015, Vicki Mayo confided in her close friend about a serious parenting challenge. Vicki’s young daughter had been experiencing night terrors, and Vicki, who had tried everything, was at her breaking point – she didn’t know what else she could do to help her six-year-old, whose nighttime screams were stressful not only to the child, but to the entire family.

Luckily, her close friend was Dr. Amy Serin, a top neuropsychologist specializing in research and clinical treatment of anxiety that hampers  relaxation, sleep, and ability to cope with sensory stimuli. Dr. Serin had used BLAST technology with her patients, her children and herself and suggested Vicki try the non-invasive, gentle set of alternating vibrations designed to alter the body’s F3 response to stress and anxiety and to restore homeostatic nervous system functioning.
Vicki tried the technology with her daughter that night, and was floored by the results. The technology  worked, and her daughter slept peacefully for the first time in months.

Vicki, a serial entrepreneur and child advocate, called Dr. Serin, who had also been thinking about how to get this technology into more people’s hands to improve their lives. Together, they founded The Touchpoint Solution™  and launched a successful crowdfunding campaign in December 2016 to raise funds to create a consumer-friendly product bringing BLAST technology to market.
How does TouchPoints™ basic help reduce my stress?

TouchPoints™ use BLAST technology that gently interferes with the body's stress response and produces a more calm, focused state. Thousands of users report they feel more calm, can focus, are able to sleep better, and perform better with use. TouchPoints™ can be used for a short duration to spot-treat stress, or they may be left on for longer periods of time to prevent it, as well as 15 minutes in the morning and at night to help improve sleep.

Yes! We want you to be 100% satisfied with your TouchPoints™. If for some reason you want to return them, we offer a 30 risk free trial from the date of arrival, provided TouchPoints™ are returned in their original condition.

Anyone who would like to feel calm or help calm down their friends, family members, or co-workers.  Moms, executives, performers, athletes, kids, teachers, occupational therapists, psychologists, medical doctors, and first responders are some of the early adopters who now use TouchPoints™ on a regular basis in a variety of situations. Parents especially find TouchPoints™ effective for managing their children's ADHD and anxiety.
What's the Difference Between TouchPoints™ basic and TouchPoints™ original?
Are TouchPoints™ and Buzzies the same thing?

Yes. When we originally launched in December 2016 TouchPoints™ were called Buzzies. We listened to customers' concerns that the name Buzzies implied loud devices that might shock the body or were only for children. To alleviate confusion, we changed the name of our gentle, non-invasive stress-relieving devices to TouchPoints™.
Is there research to back up TouchPoints™?
The TouchPoint Solution™ recently analyzed statistics from thousands of TouchPoints™ users who voluntarily entered metrics into the product’s app. Learn more about the research here.

This is data from an electroencephalogram of a brain of a 38-year-old male CEO. The left image shows excess beta activity, which translates into heightened anxiety, stress, and restlessness. The right image shows beta activity after just one minute of using TouchPoints™ with BLAST technology.
The immediate reduction in excess beta activity was consistent with the CEO’s report that he felt more focused and able to problem-solve after TouchPoints™ were activated for 30 seconds.
Optimal beta activity is associated with focus, possible memory enhancement, and the ability to problem-solve without interference from anxiety.

Images are qEEG results using a Cognionics Quick-20 Dry Headset, Neuroguide version 2.8.7, and LFT Tools Software for analysis. They show a significant reduction in excess beta activity 30 seconds after BLAST application in an eyes-open resting state condition was administered. (z = 2.5, z = 2.0)
Our vision is to create a more healthy, peaceful, and productive world through a fundamental shift in the way people understand and handle their stress response.
TouchPoints™ basic are non-invasive neuroscientific lifestyle wearables that use patent pending technology to relieve stress, improve sleep, and increase focus.
Thousands of TouchPoints™ users report over 70% reduction in stress in just 30 seconds.
Simply use them for 15 minutes every morning to get your day started right and throughout the day as needed to keep you in a peaceful state of mind.

The TouchPoint Solution™ was founded on a belief in conscious capitalism which is integrated in every area of the company from our Touch of Hope Scholarship program to working with local vendors and individuals with disabilities. In honor of #GivingTuesday, we are highlighting our Scholarship program among our other initiatives that give back to the community.

Touch of Hope Scholarship. Every month, we donate dozens of TouchPoints™ to individuals in need via our Touch Of Hope Scholarship Fund. Individuals can apply by completing a simple form. To date we have given away hundreds of TouchPoints™ to deserving families. We recently dedicated our scholarship program to MacKenzie Briant, a young girl very near and dear to all of our hearts here at The TouchPoint Solution™. Watch her inspiring story below...
Packaging and Fulfillment by Individuals with disabilities. Each and every one of our products are packaged and fulfilled by individuals with epilepsy and other developmental disabilities.
Utilization of Local Companies for packaging, graphics, printing, and carry bags.
Let's break this down into three steps:

Reduce Body Sensations: When you think of something stressful, you get an associated body sensation - think stomach butterflies or tightness in the chest. Touchpoints™ users report over 70% reduction in body sensations within 30 seconds by altering the body’s stress mechanism.

Shift Fight or Flight Response: When you're stressed, the fight or flight part of your brain (sympathetic nervous system) engages. TouchPoints™ shifts you into the logical, rational part of your brain (parasympathetic nervous system). Now when you think about something stressful, it doesn't seem as stressful anymore.

Create New Neural Pathways: When you think of something stressful without a body sensation and while in the rational part of your brain, you create a new neural pathway that is neutral to positive. This has a lasting effect in your brain reducing stress over time and is why TouchPoints™ were derived from one of the only successful treatments for PTSD.

GENERAL STRESS: Many of our customers use TouchPoints™ regularly for general stress in their day-to-day lives. General stress can affect not only one's mental, but also physical well-being. TouchPoints™ help restore a peaceful and healthy mind and body.
Case Studies show over a 90% reduction in stress headaches, increase in quality of sleep, and increase in productivity with use of TouchPoints™.

SLEEPLESSNESS: TouchPoints™ utilize proven Bi-Lateral Stimulation technology to help you fall asleep as well as go back to sleep if you wake up in the middle of the night. Proven to physically block the body's stress response by reducing beta activity in the brain and allow you a more restful night.
Case Studies show 30 minutes faster sleep onset without the need for sleeping pills as well as an 80% reduction in wakefulness.

On a hot Arizona morning in late 2015, Vicki Mayo confided in her close friend about a serious parenting challenge. Vicki’s young daughter had been experiencing night terrors, and Vicki, who had tried everything, was at her breaking point – she didn’t know what else she could do to help her six-year-old, whose nighttime screams were stressful not only to the child, but to the entire family.

Luckily, her close friend was Dr. Amy Serin, a top neuropsychologist specializing in research and clinical treatment of anxiety that hampers  relaxation, sleep, and ability to cope with sensory stimuli. Dr. Serin had used BLAST technology with her patients, her children and herself and suggested Vicki try the non-invasive, gentle set of alternating vibrations designed to alter the body’s F3 response to stress and anxiety and to restore homeostatic nervous system functioning.
Vicki tried the technology with her daughter that night, and was floored by the results. The technology  worked, and her daughter slept peacefully for the first time in months.

Vicki, a serial entrepreneur and child advocate, called Dr. Serin, who had also been thinking about how to get this technology into more people’s hands to improve their lives. Parents especially find TouchPoints™ effective for managing their children's ADHD and anxiety.

This is going to be one of the possible starting points. From here on you decide everything:
 
 
You can customize the watch however you want. Here are some examples:
 
 
 
Overview:
We are a small group of friends, who have the Idea to give everybody his/her perfect watch. Our plan is to make affordable, high-quality, customizable watches. You can choose a type of watch and then customize the dials, the colors, the strap etc. With this you can create the watch you always wanted. A unique watch, that perfectly suits you.

Details
To start this project by building some prototypes we need your support. We have designed some 3D Models and hand drawn concept arts so we just need the money to build those watches. To begin with we plan to create to classes of watches. Casual and business watches. The casual ones will have brighter colors, funkier dials and straps. The business watches will have a more simple design and darker colors with small special details and more conventional straps.
If we are not able to reach our goal we will give our best to realize the project with our own financial capabilities. If even this doesn't work we are going to make a new campaign and try to eliminate the mistakes we did. We don't give up:).
 
Create a unique masterpiece:
 
 
 
Possible risks:
Of course during such a journey a lot of difficulties appear. We already experienced this when talking to different potential business partners. A lot of them were simply not able to fulfill our quality standards or were just not trustworthy. But we managed to select a small circle of potential business partners with which we are excited to cooperate to give you the best product possible. Another problem might occur when we start our second campaign. This campaign is just there for building the prototypes. But we are confident that if this campaign is a success our next will be too.
Please support us to achieve our goal. Furthermore, we are thankful if you share this Project on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc.
