These products are now available at powderoutapparel.com

We’re PowderOut Apparel, a company driven by a simple mission: create unique, high-quality products while giving back to those in need. We designed the PowderOut Glove to prevent snow from getting up your gloves and sleeves while you’re out in the snow.

Our Products

PowderOut Gloves and Beanies come in three patterns, each representing a different region of the world (Africa, South America, and Polynesia). We donate 10% of each sale to help people in the region your pattern represents.

Features

 

Extended Sleeve

Water Resistance

The gloves and sleeves are coated with a water-resistant material, keeping your hands dry throughout the day.

The water-resistant material even coats the inside cuff and sleeve, forming a protective shield to keep water out.

 

Zipper Pocket

A zippered pocket provides a convenient place to store hand warmers, keys, or any other small items you’ll need to access quickly.

 

Connecting Clip

A connecting clip keeps your gloves together (and prevents the otherwise-inevitable 25-minute searches for your left glove).

 

Stretch

 

 The stretchy sleeve material makes for a comfortable glove fit on any arm.

 

Insulation

 3M Thinsulate keeps your hands warm on even the coldest of days.

 

Rewards Tiers

 

How We Give Back

When you purchase a product, we set aside 10% of the sale for providing microloans to individuals in the regions that your purchased patterns represent. These individuals are looking to start or grow their businesses but lack the capital to do so.

We use the platform Kiva—a marketplace for social impact microloans—to find all of the people we fund. Because the assistance is provided in the form of a loan, it will be repaid and we’ll use it to fund another project, and another, and another. This means that your purchase will continue giving back and making a difference in the world!

 

SIZING

 

TIMELINE

Risks and Challenges

The first thing you should know is that we commit to being 100% transparent with you throughout the production process. We have done our research, and the PowderOut Glove has gone through 7 different iterations and usability tests. What we are now offering are FINISHED production samples. We think these gloves are amazing and hope they exceed your expectations!

Supply Chain:
Our first batch of gloves has already been produced, and they are ready to be shipped to our Early Bird backers. These orders are on track to arrive before Christmas.

Shown below are photos from our supplier of a glove on the production line, as well as the finished products in storage a day before being shipped to us.

We have been working with our supply chain over the past year and are confident in our ability to deliver quality products on time. With the current condition of the COVID-19 pandemic, however, there is a possibility that unforeseen slowdowns could occur in shipping or with production. To mitigate this risk, we have included a buffer in our timeline to account for these possible delays. If anything should arise to put that timeline and buffer at risk, we will let you know as soon as possible and work through it together.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks for making it to the bottom of our campaign page! If you believe in our mission and product, we would love to invite you to back our campaign with a purchase or donation. Any amount will make a difference as we work together to create a ""pattern of change"" throughout the world!

Don't forget to share our campaign with your friends and family! You can find us on Instagram and Facebook.
Additionally, you can click on the social media buttons at the top of our page next to the video, and Indiegogo will make it easy to share.

 

 Thank you for your support!

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

column3:
>

 

Thanks to our AquaScreen Tech™, you don’t have to long-jump rain puddles anymore.

Our coffee-lined membrane creates a watertight barrier to keep your feet totally dry. It's built to be waterproof from the ground up for the shoe’s entire life cycle.
column5:
> 

Rens' waterproof membrane, powered by our AquaScreen Tech ™, allows air to pass through easily while maintaining 100% protection from water penetration. We put the material to test by submerging it in water and forcing air through. As you can see below, the membrane allows air to pass through either side while keeping water out, making it totally breathable.
column9:
>

Rens are moisture-wicking thanks to the coffee and the upper layer dry-fast feature. And they absorb all your foot sweat and release it through the fibers and out of your shoe.
column14: >
column16:

Each pair of Rens is made from 300 grams of coffee waste and 6 recycled plastic bottles. So you get all the benefits of an awesome shoe while reducing the amount of plastic waste and methane-producing organic waste in landfills.
